title: 全新IP：号称Web3.0的抖音Rocket Video是什么来头？
body:
众所周知，在GAMEFI圈是没有秘密的。一个游戏的诞生到陨落从头到尾都是透明化的。2022年的重头戏无非是年初火爆一时的星鲨（来的猛，走的也壮烈） ，还有就是持续性最长，也是最赚钱的StepN运动游戏。今年你可能没吃猪肉，也听说过StepN。接下来重点介绍的这款X TO EARN游戏应该是今年我除外跑鞋，体验过的相对最有可玩性的项目（仅代表个人观点）。

回归主题，我们玩区块链游戏不是为了过瘾，主要的还是看稳定性和投资回报比。下面介绍这款号称WEB3抖音的视频项目Rocket Video(下面称火箭视频）

**注：投资项目有风险，文章只是做个人观点，非投资建议**

## 一、火箭视频项目简介

Rocket Video的团队成员主要来自北美，项目目标是成为web3的抖音。目前项目已经获得若干VC的800万美元的投资（消息来源币安）。安卓版本和苹果应用程序已经上线（均可在官网下载），应用的关键功能都已经实现，实操体验比较好。

玩家关心的安全性方便，项目已经通过Certik的安全审计。众所周知Certik应该是全球最具权威性的安全审计公司，所以在安全性方面还是可以放心的。

玩家打金的赚钱途径：玩家通过完成点赞、评论、分享等方式每日获得RVT代币（RVT目前已经上线薄饼），也可以通过创作视频和邀请新人获得RTV代币变现。

与其他项目相比，火箭视频的最大优势是自带流量属性，互动社交本身就是一种引流的最佳方式。持续的新流量为项目获取持久性。

## 二、APP入门使用说明

### 1.APP安装

打开[Rocket官网](https://www.rocketvideo.io/)，点击右上角login后选择I don’t have an account进行注册，邮箱一定要填写准确，要通过邮箱验证激活账号，然后下载手机APP，安卓用户直接安装即可，苹果用户需要安装Testflight才能完成

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1X3F-zKChe573ZDPBhDTj.png?height=75&width=468)

### 2.重新填写邀请码

打开APP并登录后，需要填写邀请码（没有可以找群里要，群链接在文章底部）

### 3.创建钱包

创建一个用于火箭视频的新钱包，切记备份好助记词，然后导入手机钱包，用这个钱包去官网购买NFT参与打金获取代币（确定要玩后在买）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/03DI2-OFexGzgGI6zsZJ_.png?height=575&width=654)

## 三、代币经济学和NFT概览

### 1.代币 RVT

RVT 总发行量为 10 亿枚，将在 7 年内解锁。应用内挖矿产出 80% 挖矿产出主要分为3部分：

1 .Play-2Earn 通过在 Rocket App 中玩游戏赚取；

2 .Watch-2Earn 观看视频并赚取；

3 .Social-2Earn 分享、点赞、评论；其中销售 3% 将用于私募和公开发售

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dl6e5xbvF4gHV8WYaAcms.png?height=315&width=545)

### 2.Rocket NFT

首批发行2000个创世秘盒(5/23白名单400MINT 公开发售1600)

用户持有nft 可获得广告分成，俱乐部门票，周边20%利润，购物优惠券，质押挖矿

不定期发布纪念盲盒

盲盒等级：普通，优秀，稀有，史诗，传奇

RVT首次空投3000万，第一年产出8000万币

1\.每日任务池，占每日产出的60%，

浏览视频 30 分钟，点赞 20 个视频，发表 10 条评论，分享 5 个视频。

2 .创作者池，占日产出的30%成为创造者需要持有优秀级别以上的NFT，

根据点赞数计算创意算力，评论和转发创作者每天收到的视频，

日产币/全网日总创造算力=每个创造性算力所能获得的RVT数量。

3 .邀请奖励池，占日产出的10%

每邀请一位购买火箭秘盒的用户，即可获得秘盒碎片，消耗20个秘盒碎片可获得一个NFT秘盒；

分享邀请海报即可获得神秘盒子碎片1个（每日仅限一次）；

每次被邀请用户产生一个算力值（仅限每日任务），邀请人可获得1点邀请算力；

日产币/全网每日邀请总算力= 每个邀请算力可以获得的 RVT 数量。

## 四、打金模式

Rocket Video 的打金流程简介 ：

购买火箭NFT➡质押相应的RVT➡获得能源➡给火箭充能➡完成每日任务➡发射火箭➡获得算力➡通过算力获得相应的RVT（被动锁定3天）➡PancakeSwap交易RVT

**需要注意的是，刚买回来的火箭是没有能源的，需要质押RVT两天后（每天中午12点为一天）才能发射，也可以通过场外交易让别人帮你充能。**

下面我们对整个系统做一个详细的解释，我们需要先了解一些名词，便于理解玩法。

### 1.火箭NFT

玩家需要在官网购买火箭NFT才能参与打金游戏，越贵的火箭收益越高，火箭本身也能升级，等级越高收益也会越高

a、3个普通等级的NFT可以合成1个优秀NFT，合成时需销毁10RVT

b、3个优秀NFT可以合成1个稀有NFT，合成时需销毁100RVT

c、3个稀有NFT可以合成1个史诗NFT，合成时需销毁1000RVT

*Tips：如果mint的时候发现gas异常，不要强制mint，关闭程序，重新打开mint或者换个钱包*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/r33ubuQghMVKgvjzM5mD5.png?height=243&width=773)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WLiP8-cavi9pwLNhqcieY.png?height=468&width=1020)

### 2.任务和算力

系统设置有每日任务，需要完成点赞、评论、分享、观看等任务。

完成每日任务后会获得算力，每日不同NFT的算力是不一样的，请记住以下公式：

**算力每天获得的RVT数量=全网每日产币量/全网总算力**

每日任务量基本是哪个固定的，其中每日任务量占60%，创作池占30%，受邀池占10%。

所以，如果未来系统内的人越多，每个人的RVT越少，相反的，数字减少，分的RVT会增加，可以说是一个不错的动态平衡系统。

RVT合同：0x5d4eaf65B348Be3889193913ef366D306a9fbD73

可以在PancakeSwap交易。

### 3.能源系统

每一个Rocket NFT都具有一个能源值，新买回来的火箭是没有能源的，需要质押RVT（可随时解压），T+2后1：1获得能源，也可以找已经入场的朋友帮你充能（需要花钱），大家可以在我的推文下面留下自己的联系方式，互相帮忙充能。

质押的RVT采用了时间加权算法，质押的RVT时间越长则其币领越大，获得的能源点越多。

每次发射火箭还会产生磨损，当耐久度小于61的时候需要消耗RVT进行维修。

Epic火箭发射需要消耗3500能量，相应需要质押的RVT也更多。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EJSnFANg2X4IKRLhCt1wJ.png?height=748&width=1352)

### 4.回本期

总结其他攻略，已经有先入场的计算了回本周期，Epic Rocket 大约 15-20 天回本（NFT），这里 RVT 和 BNB 的价格是波动的，所以回本周期也是在一直变化的，如果多号参与的话，算上奖励系统，还能加速回本周期。本人刚玩，根据当前计算普通NFT回本时间大约为30天。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6b5J9zuHgLmF3s5hiUrxR.png?height=260&width=1135)

## 五、结束语

在币圈整体大环境的情况下，努力做应用程序的项目少之又少，Rocket Video 正是这样一个项目。不错的项目。

随着团队的时间，更好地提升开发水平。

这里有部分内容收集和一个攻略和官方介绍。感谢之前的作者组，以及前人拍摄的树群人乘凉，下面是美德内部。

官方链接：

[https://www.rocketvideo.io/](https://www.rocketvideo.io/)

官方不和谐群：

[https://discord.gg/BQAe6dWC6W](https://discord.gg/BQAe6dWC6W)

官方游戏介绍：

[https://gpixgg.notion.site/Rocket-Video-f86f4cad440f40669fd717d29bdd8c45](https://gpixgg.notion.site/Rocket-Video-f86f4cad440f40669fd717d29bdd8c45)

title: NFTアートとの付き合い方【後悔しないための心構え】
body:
どうも、[まついち](https://twitter.com/matsu1com)です。

今回は「NFTアートとの付き合い方【後悔しないための心構え】」という内容でお送りします。

## NFTアートに触れ3ヶ月

私自身はじめてNFTを購入してから3ヶ月ほど経過しました。

この2月から5月の3ヶ月は私にとっても、そして日本市場にとっても激動の時間となりました。

この激動の時間を過ごす中、嬉しい思いも悔しい思いもしてきたので、その記録を綴りたいと思います。

### Mirrorでの執筆について

そして、お気づきの通り、今回はMirrorにて執筆しています。その理由は主に2つあります。

1つ目の理由は、普段はWordPressで文章を書いているのですが、今回はひたすら自分語りになるのでSEO的に有益な記事にするのは不適切かと思い、Mirrorを選択しました。

2つ目の理由は徐々にWeb3の媒体にシフトするための実験をしてみたいという理由です。MirrorはWordPressのWeb3版とも言われているので今のうちに触っておいて損はないと感じています。

それでは、初めての記事 on Mirrorをご覧ください。

## NFTと向き合うことで消耗する精神

みなさんは日頃NFTと付き合う上で楽しい思いをしていますか？

私は基本的には楽しい思いをしているのですが、時に気が滅入ってしまう時があります。

例えば、

* **欲しかったNFTが購入できなかった時**
* **投資目的で購入し、失敗してしまった時**
* **仮想通貨のチャートが下がってしまった時**
* **GOXしてしまった時**

こんなことが挙げられます。（幸い、私はGOX未経験です笑）

特にNFTアートはその性質柄、目を離すことはできなく毎日アンテナを張り続ける必要があります。

この行為を好きでやれているうちはいいですが、作業になってしまうと純粋にNFTアートを楽しむことができなくなってしまうのではないでしょうか。

私自身、新しい作品や注目度の高い作品がローンチされることに対しては、高揚感を覚えますが、WLを獲得しなければならなかったり、PCに張り付いてミント時間を待つのは正直とても疲れます。

### 損得勘定で考えない

そこで、一つ大事なことを自分の中で決めています。

それは、「NFTアートをできるだけ損得勘定で考えない」ということです。

はい、無理です。笑

正直、全く損得勘定を持たないでNFTアートを購入できている方はごくわずかだと思います。

しかしながら、少しでも損得勘定の考えを軽減することは可能だと思っています。下記ではそのことについて深掘りしていきます。

## 自分なりのNFTアートの購入基準を設定する

ここでは、私なりのNFTアートの購入基準について書いていきます。

私がたどり着いた自分なりの最強の購入基準なので、もしよかったら参考にしてみてください。

（既に自分なりの基準がある方や、これから基準を見つけていきたい方はぜひ、自分の意思を貫いてください笑）

それでは、こちらが私の購入基準です。

* **無理のない資金の範囲内である**
* **直感的に「好きだ」と感じる**
* **間違いなくこれから流行るアートである**
* **自分が購入することでクリエイターを応援できる**
* **ストーリー、プロセス、世界観、背景が明確である**

以上の５つが私の現在の購入基準です。全部当てはまっているから買うのではなく、どれか1つでも当てはまる場合は購入を検討します。

### 投資的に期待する比重を少なく保つ

何度も言うようですが、私は投資的に期待をする比重を少なくしています。

「投資的目的：上記の基準＝3：7」ぐらいの配分でしょうか。

というのも、私は過去に投資的に価値があるというだけでNFTアートを購入し失敗してしまった経験があります。

そのNFTアートは世間的に人気で私はその流れに乗って、急かされるように購入しました。

購入した時の気持ちとして「これから価値があがるだろう。アートはそんなに好きじゃないな。」こんな感じでした。

結果、価値は上がらず、好きではないアートが手元に残ってしまいました。

「損切りして終わりじゃん」、「投資では日常茶飯事」そんな声が聞こえてきそうですが、私は投資経験者でもなければ学生ですので、気持ち的にも余裕がありませんでした。（余裕がないならNFTをやるな笑）

(追記：投機目的で購入するNFTと作品が好きで購入するNFTで自分の気持ちに区切りをつけるということが最近できるようになってきました笑)

この経験から、上記の5つの基準を定めました。

特に、**本当に自分が心から愛せるNFTアートだけを購入する**ということは徹底しています。

そういうマインドを持っていれば、投資的に期待する比重を少なくすることができますし、それが精神的な負担を軽くしてくれます。

## そうして出会った最高のNFTs

そして先ほど、上記の基準から購入したNFTがあります。

それが[コチラ](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/46965151181709873022127412813581259762625831679601743551961723912089650593793)です。

![＃0118](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tZjwY90rvvj5lk-XMMTll.jpeg?height=446&width=600)

今回、私が購入したのはUjinさんのセルフィーNFTです。

上記で記した基準とは別に「美人だから購入したんだろ」と思われそうですが、はいそうです笑

美人だから購入したのは間違いないのですが、きちんと上記の五つの基準から購入しました笑

詳しく基準を追っていきましょう。

* このNFTは0.07ETHと決して高価なNFTではありません。
* 私はこのNFTを見た瞬間に「好きだ」と感じることができました。
* こちらのコレクションはストーリーや背景が明確で長期的に運営してくれそうな信頼感が伝わってきました。

このあたりは話すと長くなるので別のセクションで執筆していきたいと思います。

### 投資的側面から考えると・・・

もちろん、比重は置いていないですが、投資的にも考えています。

この作品は見れば分かる通り、「Murakami.flowers」が写っています。

「Murakami.flowers」は誰もが知るNFTアートですから、価値がつきやすいと判断しました。

また、Twitterのアイコン(pfp)にした時のインパクトが大きいと思ったのも一つの理由です。

結果的に0.5ETHでリストしました。(このあたり、容易には売れてほしくない気持ちが強気に表れていると思います。)

心から愛せるNFTアートを選択できれば

**→売れたら爆益**

**→売れなくてもホルダーとしてpfpやアイコンなどに汎用できる**

とどちらに転んでも幸せな未来が訪れることを発見しました。

投資的に価値のつきやすいNFTの基準も明確に自分の中で見つけましたが、このあたりは[WordPress](https://nft-matome.com)で書きたいと思います笑

## NFTを購入することで訪れるコミュニケーション

そして、今回一番書きたかったのが「NFTを購入することで訪れるコミュニケーション」についてです。

私は実はこの部分が一番好きだったりします。

さきほどUjinさんのselfie NFTを購入したといいましたが、その際もコミュニケーションのをとることができました。

コチラのツイートをご覧ください。

[https://twitter.com/Ujin1ne/status/1528736828983246848?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1528736828983246848%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fpublish.twitter.com%2F%3Fquery%3Dhttps3A2F2Ftwitter.com2FUjin1ne2Fstatus2F1528736828983246848widget%3DTweet](https://twitter.com/Ujin1ne/status/1528736828983246848?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1528736828983246848%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fpublish.twitter.com%2F%3Fquery%3Dhttps3A2F2Ftwitter.com2FUjin1ne2Fstatus2F1528736828983246848widget%3DTweet)

こちらは私がNFTを購入した後に、Ujinさんがしてくださったツイートです。

このようにNFTを購入すれば、ホルダーとクリエイター間でコミュニケーションがとることができます。

なんと私は日本人で始めてのホルダーだったので特に親切にメッセージをくださいました。

このあたりが、人間的な温かみを感じることができて嬉しいです。

### 単なるホルダーでいたくない

そして私は、ホルダーになるからには単なるホルダーになりたくないです。

これはどういうことかというと、\*\*「クリエイターが生み出したアートを単純に所持するだけにしない。」\*\*ということです。

私はホルダーであるからには、クリエイターとともに作品（アート）を盛り上げる必要があると考えています。

まさに私もマーケティング的に協力してクリエイターを支援するといった形です。

こうすることでクリエイターとホルダー間でさらなる強い絆が生まれますし、相互作用で作品が売れれば、それほど幸せなことはないでしょう。

ホルダーにとっても、作品の価値が上がることは嬉しいのです。

## 終わりに

いかがでしたでしょうか。今回は「NFTアートとの付き合い方【後悔しないための心構え】」という内容でお送りしました。

Mirrorの使い方がわからず、装飾などコーディングが適当で見づらい部分があったと思いますが、ここまで見てくださりありがとうございました。

今後もMirrorでは私的な思いをぶつける文章を書いていきます。

それでは、WAGMI！

title: 全新IP：号称Web3.0的抖音Rocket Video是什么来头？
body:
众所周知，在GAMEFI圈是没有秘密的。一个游戏的诞生到陨落从头到尾都是透明化的。2022年的重头戏无非是年初火爆一时的星鲨（来的猛，走的也壮烈） ，还有就是持续性最长，也是最赚钱的StepN运动游戏。今年你可能没吃猪肉，也听说过StepN。接下来重点介绍的这款X TO EARN游戏应该是今年我除外跑鞋，体验过的相对最有可玩性的项目（仅代表个人观点）。

回归主题，我们玩区块链游戏不是为了过瘾，主要的还是看稳定性和投资回报比。下面介绍这款号称WEB3抖音的视频项目Rocket Video(下面称火箭视频）

**注：投资项目有风险，文章只是做个人观点，非投资建议**

## 一、火箭视频项目简介

Rocket Video的团队成员主要来自北美，项目目标是成为web3的抖音。目前项目已经获得若干VC的800万美元的投资（消息来源币安）。安卓版本和苹果应用程序已经上线（均可在官网下载），应用的关键功能都已经实现，实操体验比较好。

玩家关心的安全性方便，项目已经通过Certik的安全审计。众所周知Certik应该是全球最具权威性的安全审计公司，所以在安全性方面还是可以放心的。

玩家打金的赚钱途径：玩家通过完成点赞、评论、分享等方式每日获得RVT代币（RVT目前已经上线薄饼），也可以通过创作视频和邀请新人获得RTV代币变现。

与其他项目相比，火箭视频的最大优势是自带流量属性，互动社交本身就是一种引流的最佳方式。持续的新流量为项目获取持久性。

## 二、APP入门使用说明

### 1.APP安装

打开[Rocket官网](https://www.rocketvideo.io/)，点击右上角login后选择I don’t have an account进行注册，邮箱一定要填写准确，要通过邮箱验证激活账号，然后下载手机APP，安卓用户直接安装即可，苹果用户需要安装Testflight才能完成

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1X3F-zKChe573ZDPBhDTj.png?height=75&width=468)

### 2.重新填写邀请码

打开APP并登录后，需要填写邀请码（没有可以找群里要，群链接在文章底部）

### 3.创建钱包

创建一个用于火箭视频的新钱包，切记备份好助记词，然后导入手机钱包，用这个钱包去官网购买NFT参与打金获取代币（确定要玩后在买）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/03DI2-OFexGzgGI6zsZJ_.png?height=575&width=654)

## 三、代币经济学和NFT概览

### 1.代币 RVT

RVT 总发行量为 10 亿枚，将在 7 年内解锁。应用内挖矿产出 80% 挖矿产出主要分为3部分：

1 .Play-2Earn 通过在 Rocket App 中玩游戏赚取；

2 .Watch-2Earn 观看视频并赚取；

3 .Social-2Earn 分享、点赞、评论；其中销售 3% 将用于私募和公开发售

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dl6e5xbvF4gHV8WYaAcms.png?height=315&width=545)

### 2.Rocket NFT

首批发行2000个创世秘盒(5/23白名单400MINT 公开发售1600)

用户持有nft 可获得广告分成，俱乐部门票，周边20%利润，购物优惠券，质押挖矿

不定期发布纪念盲盒

盲盒等级：普通，优秀，稀有，史诗，传奇

RVT首次空投3000万，第一年产出8000万币

1\.每日任务池，占每日产出的60%，

浏览视频 30 分钟，点赞 20 个视频，发表 10 条评论，分享 5 个视频。

2 .创作者池，占日产出的30%成为创造者需要持有优秀级别以上的NFT，

根据点赞数计算创意算力，评论和转发创作者每天收到的视频，

日产币/全网日总创造算力=每个创造性算力所能获得的RVT数量。

3 .邀请奖励池，占日产出的10%

每邀请一位购买火箭秘盒的用户，即可获得秘盒碎片，消耗20个秘盒碎片可获得一个NFT秘盒；

分享邀请海报即可获得神秘盒子碎片1个（每日仅限一次）；

每次被邀请用户产生一个算力值（仅限每日任务），邀请人可获得1点邀请算力；

日产币/全网每日邀请总算力= 每个邀请算力可以获得的 RVT 数量。

## 四、打金模式

Rocket Video 的打金流程简介 ：

购买火箭NFT➡质押相应的RVT➡获得能源➡给火箭充能➡完成每日任务➡发射火箭➡获得算力➡通过算力获得相应的RVT（被动锁定3天）➡PancakeSwap交易RVT

**需要注意的是，刚买回来的火箭是没有能源的，需要质押RVT两天后（每天中午12点为一天）才能发射，也可以通过场外交易让别人帮你充能。**

下面我们对整个系统做一个详细的解释，我们需要先了解一些名词，便于理解玩法。

### 1.火箭NFT

玩家需要在官网购买火箭NFT才能参与打金游戏，越贵的火箭收益越高，火箭本身也能升级，等级越高收益也会越高

a、3个普通等级的NFT可以合成1个优秀NFT，合成时需销毁10RVT

b、3个优秀NFT可以合成1个稀有NFT，合成时需销毁100RVT

c、3个稀有NFT可以合成1个史诗NFT，合成时需销毁1000RVT

*Tips：如果mint的时候发现gas异常，不要强制mint，关闭程序，重新打开mint或者换个钱包*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/r33ubuQghMVKgvjzM5mD5.png?height=243&width=773)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WLiP8-cavi9pwLNhqcieY.png?height=468&width=1020)

### 2.任务和算力

系统设置有每日任务，需要完成点赞、评论、分享、观看等任务。

完成每日任务后会获得算力，每日不同NFT的算力是不一样的，请记住以下公式：

**算力每天获得的RVT数量=全网每日产币量/全网总算力**

每日任务量基本是哪个固定的，其中每日任务量占60%，创作池占30%，受邀池占10%。

所以，如果未来系统内的人越多，每个人的RVT越少，相反的，数字减少，分的RVT会增加，可以说是一个不错的动态平衡系统。

RVT合同：0x5d4eaf65B348Be3889193913ef366D306a9fbD73

可以在PancakeSwap交易。

### 3.能源系统

每一个Rocket NFT都具有一个能源值，新买回来的火箭是没有能源的，需要质押RVT（可随时解压），T+2后1：1获得能源，也可以找已经入场的朋友帮你充能（需要花钱），大家可以在我的推文下面留下自己的联系方式，互相帮忙充能。

质押的RVT采用了时间加权算法，质押的RVT时间越长则其币领越大，获得的能源点越多。

每次发射火箭还会产生磨损，当耐久度小于61的时候需要消耗RVT进行维修。

Epic火箭发射需要消耗3500能量，相应需要质押的RVT也更多。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EJSnFANg2X4IKRLhCt1wJ.png?height=748&width=1352)

### 4.回本期

总结其他攻略，已经有先入场的计算了回本周期，Epic Rocket 大约 15-20 天回本（NFT），这里 RVT 和 BNB 的价格是波动的，所以回本周期也是在一直变化的，如果多号参与的话，算上奖励系统，还能加速回本周期。本人刚玩，根据当前计算普通NFT回本时间大约为30天。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6b5J9zuHgLmF3s5hiUrxR.png?height=260&width=1135)

## 五、结束语

在币圈整体大环境不佳的环境下，努力做应用程序的项目少之又少，Rocket Video 正是这样一个项目。整体体验和更新速度都是不错的项目。

相信随着时间的推移，开发团队会结合前期的经验开发出更好体验的产品。

本人文笔有限，文章部分内容引用第三方攻略和官方文案。再此感谢之前的作者们写的攻略

**下面是官方网站和群链接：**

官方链接：

[https://www.rocketvideo.io/](https://www.rocketvideo.io/)

官方不和谐群：

[https://discord.gg/BQAe6dWC6W](https://discord.gg/BQAe6dWC6W)

官方游戏介绍：

[https://gpixgg.notion.site/Rocket-Video-f86f4cad440f40669fd717d29bdd8c45](https://gpixgg.notion.site/Rocket-Video-f86f4cad440f40669fd717d29bdd8c45)

title: 去中心化数据仓库Space and Time完成1000万美元融资，Framework Ventures领投
body:
随着 DeFi 和 GameFi 迅猛发展，相关市场急需安全、快速的去中心化企业级数据处理解决方案，Space and Time 已成为该领域首个“探路者”。

Space and Time 是为区块链应用构建的去中心化数据仓库，通过加密证明技术使 dApps 能以完全去信任和高安全的方式提供低延迟数据查询和企业级规模的数据分析服务。7 月 29 日，该公司宣布完成 1000 万美元种子轮融资，Framework Ventures 领投，Digital Currency Group (DCG )、Stratos、SamsungNext、IOSG Ventures 、Alliance、以及其他一些DeFi、GameFi 和 VC 机构参投。得益于这笔最新融资，Space and Time 将加速旗下软件工程建设，同时进一步提升平台分析能力和去中心化网络规模。

Space and Time 构建了一种全新“SQLTM 证明”加密协议（正在申请专利），该协议能使区块链应用程序以完全去中心化、可扩展和安全的方式快速对海量数据进行处理并生成具有洞察力的分析结果，节点运营网络从区块链、去中心化应用程序和链下系统中提取数据后即可执行数据操作和分析计算。对于区块链而言，Space and Time 可以大幅提升独立、去信任环境中查询链上数据和链下数据功能，继而为链上智能合约带来更多、更先进的创新用例。

Space and Time 的数据库会在链下创建数据查询结果证明，然后将其传输到验证层并验证证明的真实性。一旦验证通过，数据就会上链并加载到智能合约，此时 dApp 可以在智能合约中实时访问数据查询结果信息。不仅如此，由于 Space and Time 将大量计算工作转移到了链下，因此在分析工作负载中链上和链下数据可以得到合理分配，现有区块链基础设施就能在确保计算完整性的情况下进行指数级扩展。Space and Time 联合创始人 Nate Holiday 表示：

> “随着 Web3 业务流程越来越成熟、自动化水平越来越高，开发人员和应用程序需要更先进的数据库计算服务，将链下分析结果直接连接到智能合约。然而，由于当前区块链生态系统可扩展性问题，使得链上分析无法满足用户需求，而中心化数据分析平台又难以生成高安全、防篡改的分析结果。Space and Time 可以解决这些问题，通过将链下计算与去中心化和加密保证的数据处理相结合来满足 dApp 开发人员和企业用户的下一代高安全性数据需求。”

领投方，Framework Ventures 联合创始人 Michael Anderson 说道：

> “许多 dApp 仍然依赖中心化数据库来存储和计算大量复杂数据，这意味着大多数 DeFi 和 GameFi 平台都没有完全去中心化。作为第一个提供去中心化企业级实时分析解决方案的数据平台，Space and Time 秉承了区块链行业的核心精神，即——构建一个透明和开放的系统。我们很高兴能够支持 Space and Time 团队，因为他们为下一代 DeFi 应用程序开发了首个同时具有可扩展性和安全性的数据分析解决方案。”

值得一提的是，Space and Time 还是 Chainlink Labs 旗下 Startup with Chainlink 的孵化项目，因此能在区块链预言机服务 Chainlink 支持下、结合链上和链下数据为智能合约应用带来更多具有高扩展性的企业级用例。谈到本次融资，Chainlink Labs 企业发展和战略董事总经理 David Post 称：

> “祝贺 Space and Time 团队成功获得种子轮融资，投资方中有许多行业领先的公司。通过数据处理和加密证明创新技术，Space and Time 去中心化数据库将进一步扩大区块链生态系统并解锁更多智能合约用例。”

### 关于 Space and Time

Space and Time 是加密行业第一个为区块链应用构建的去中心化数据仓库，通过加密证明技术使 dApps 能以完全去信任和高安全的方式提供低延迟数据查询和企业级规模的数据分析服务。

如果想了解更多关于 Space and Time 的信息，可点击[此处](https://www.spaceandtime.io/)。

### 关于 Framework Ventures 

Framework 是一个由技术人员、研究人员和投资者组成的团队，Framework Ventures Management LLC（“Framework Ventures”）为旗下投资部门。从本质上讲，Framework 是一家技术公司，因为他们会构建产品和服务来支持旗下投资的开放区块链网络，而 Framework Ventures 迄今已经在 DeFi 和 Web3 领域支持了数十家知名公司。

如果想了解更多关于 Framework Ventures 的信息，可点击[此处](https://framework.ventures/)。

### 关于 Chainlink Labs

Chainlink 是构建、访问和销售为任何区块链上混合智能合约所需的预言机“行业标准”，其预言机网络为智能合约提供了一种连接到任何外部应用程序接口（API）并利用链下安全计算启用应用的解决方案，目前为DeFi、保险、游戏和其他加密领域内价值数百亿美元的资产提供安全保障，而且已经成为全球企业和数据服务提供商的“通用网关”。

如果想了解更多关于 Chainlink Labs 的信息，可点击[此处](http://chain.link/)。

title: 尽管遭到强烈反对，34%的玩家表示有兴趣在元宇宙中使用加密货币
body:
尽管遭到了游戏社区部分人的强烈反对，但一项新的调查显示，三分之一的游戏玩家表示有兴趣在元宇宙中使用加密货币。

 
 

而且更多玩家认为元宇宙将对游戏产生积极影响。

 

该调查由机构软件开发商Globant于7月13日发布。上月，YouGov对1000名成人PC、游戏机和/或手机游戏玩家进行了调查，34%的受访者表示对在元宇宙中进行加密货币交易感兴趣。

 
 

元宇宙的“边玩边赚”(P2E)概念也比较受玩家的欢迎，40%的受访者表示，他们“有兴趣追求元宇宙中‘玩’和‘赚’方面的结合。”而11%的受访者表示他们对赚钱更感兴趣，49%的受访者表示他们只对玩游戏感兴趣。

 

超过一半(53%)的受访者还表示，如果他们能够通过劳动赚取数字货币，他们会很乐意在虚拟游戏世界工作。

 
 

在NFT方面，16%的玩家表示他们在过去至少购买过一个NFT，但不清楚它是否为与游戏相关的NFT。

 
 

超过一半(52%)的玩家认为元宇宙将改变电子游戏行业，“41%的人认为元宇宙将对行业产生积极影响(25%的人持相反意见)。”

 

然而，值得注意的是，尽管40%的受访者将区块链技术与元宇宙联系在一起，但只有一个区块链原生平台进入了最受认可的元宇宙品牌名单。

 
 

最受认可的是Meta(73%)，其次是《堡垒之夜》开发商Epic Games (27%)， Roblox(21%)，基于以太坊的The Sandbox(15%)和 《宝可梦GO》开发商Niantic(10%)。

 

一些铁杆玩家已经在许多场合表达了对加密货币和NFT的厌恶，这通常是对大公司和品牌宣布将加密货币和NFT集成到其产品线中的回应。

 
 

他们批评了这项技术对环境的影响，认为它会对游戏体验产生负面影响，但其核心理由似乎是，他们认为这些公司只是在寻找类似于备受争议的游戏内微交易的骗钱方式。

title: Web3 alanında nasıl staj/iş bulunur?
body:
Öncelikle şunu belirtmek isterim burada anlatacağım şeyler benim tecrübelerim değil. Ben bunların hiç birini yapıp bir staj ya da işe girmeye çalışmadım fakat 2 seneye yakın süredir bu ekosistemdeyim ve gözlemlerimi aktaracağım.

Her şeyden önce İngilizce bilmek zorundasınız. İngilizce bilmezseniz burada tutunamazsınız. Belki bir kaç Türk projelerine girebilirsiniz fakat oradan ileriye gidemezsiniz. İngilizce bu alanda Web2 alanına göre daha büyük önem arz ediyor. Neden? Web2 dünyasında yerel bir yazılım firmasında sigortalı bir işe başlayabilir ve ölene kadar orada çalışabilirsiniz. Ama Web3 alanında bunu yapamazsınız. Yeni bir alan olması nedeniyle sürekli gelişiyor, bu gelişmeleri Türkçe olarak takip etmeye çalışırsanız çağın gerisinde kalırsınız. Kimse dünyadan bihaber birisiyle çalışmak istemez.

Sonrasında bu alanın felsefesini anlamanız gerekiyor. Neden böyle bir teknolojiye ihtiyaç duyuluyor? Neden insanlar, büyük şirketler Web3 alanına yatırım yapıyor? Klasik Web2 dünyasından bu alanın farkı nedir? Kendime bu dünyadan nasıl yer bulabilirim? Eski dünya normları: Şirketler, üniversite diplomaları, sertifika peşinden koşmak vs. çoğunlukla bu yeni dünyada bir önem arz etmiyor. Olmaları size avantaj sağlar fakat şart değiller. Bir işi yapmaya yetkinliğiniz var mı? Önemli olan şey bu. Bu felsefe neden önemli? Çünkü sizin hedefiniz Web3 alanında sigortalı bir işe girmek olmamalı. Web3 dünyasında şirketler değil projeler var ve bu projelerin bir çoğu açık kaynak kodlu. Bu projelere katkıda bulunabilirsiniz veya kendi projelerinizi yaratabilirsiniz.

(Ayrıca bknz: <https://twitter.com/0xabd_/status/1520503312717647872>)

Şu an Web3’de geliştiricilerden fazla yatırımcı var. Bundan dolayı yazılımcılara büyük önem veriliyor ve çoğu projenin Twitter hesabında (“We are hiring”) ibaresini görebilirsiniz.

Diploma yok, eğitim sertifikası yok e o kim benimle neden ekip arkadaşı olmak istesin? Kendinizi ispatlamanız gerekiyor. Yazılım alanında aktif bir Github hesabı, fikirlerinizi paylaştığınız ve tartışmalara dahil olduğunuz bir Twitter hesabı, Projelerin discord sunucularına girdiğiniz bir Discord hesabı sizin CV’niz olabilir. Bir çok kişi discord üzerinden iş sahibi oldu ve ben buna bizzat şahit oldum. Bunu nasıl yaptılar? Şu an piyasada bulunan tüm projelerin bir Discord sunucusu var. O discord sunucuların içerisinde kimler var? Bizzat o projenin başındaki kişiler. O sunucuların içerisinde %95 ihtimalle “ #dev-chat” kanalı bulunur. Oraları bir inceleyin derim. İnsanlar orada neler paylaşıyor bir bakın. En basitinden, hoşunuza giden bir projenin discord sunucusuna girin ve #dev-chat’e proje hakkındaki geliştirilebilecek fikirlerinizi sunun. Eminim 10 projeye bunu yazsanız en az 5’inden geri dönüş alacaksınız.

Twitter ise ayrı bir ekosistem. Elbette denk gelmişsinizdir: #100DaysOfCodingChallange diye bir şey var. 100 gün boyunca her gün bir şeyler yapıp bunun Twitter üzerinde paylaşıyorlar. Bunu Web3 alanında yapanlar da var. Bu insanların çoğu 100. güne ulaşmadan bir işe yada bir projeye giriyorlar. Çünkü kendilerini ispatlıyorlar. Ne yapabileceklerini göstermiş oluyorlar. Gelişiminiz ve yaptığınız her şeyi paylaşın. Paylaşmaktan çekinmeyin.

Web3 alanında en önemli şeylerden birisi de bana göre network. Araştırın. Coinmarketcap’e girin, rastgele bir proje seçin. Discordlarına girin. Dev rolüne sahip kimler var bakın. O insanlarla iletişim kurun. En fazla geri mesaj alamazsınız. En iyi ihtimalle o projenin başındaki kişiyle iletişim kurmuş olursunuz. Twitter da aynı şekilde. Web3 yazılımı denilince akla gelen 100’e yakın insan var. O insanların gönderilerinin altına sorularınızı sorun. Dikkat çekin. O sorunuzu gören birisi, sizin aktif Twitter hesabınızı görüp oradan aktif Github hesabınıza gitse belki de iş sahibi olabilirsiniz. Bunu yapın. “Your network is your net worth.”

Bir başka yol ise DAO’lara katılmak. Örneğin [DEV_DAO](https://twitter.com/developer_dao) bir Web3 geliştiricileri topluluğu. DAO’ya dahil olmak için onların NFT’sine sahip olmanız gerekiyor. Peki insanlar neden buraya girmek için para veriyor? Network. Etrafınızda Web3 alanında çalışan insalar olursa eminim size de bir iş düşecektir. Biz [SCDEVSTR](https://twitter.com/scdevstr) discord sunucunda da böyle bir ortam oluşturuyoruz. Bu alanda para kazanmak için bir işe girmenize gerek yok. Bağımsız bir geliştirici olup proje başına da para kazanarak büyük paralar kazanabilirsiniz.

(Ayrıca bknz: <https://twitter.com/edatweets_/status/1483040244530393090>)

Ben bunlarla uğraşamam direkt CV’mi yollayabileceğim yerler yok mu? Var.

1-) <https://web3.career/intern-jobs>

Bu site bana göre Web3’nin Linkedin’i olabilir. Linkte Web3 alanında 500’den fazla staj ilanı bulunuyor. Birer birer hepsine bakıp hangi şartları istediklerine bakabilirsiniz ve eğer uygun olduğunuzu düşünüyorsanız iletişime geçebilirsiniz. Bence, kendinizi yetersiz hissediyorsanız bile başvurun. Reddedilmekten korkmayın. Bazı şeyler yaparak öğrenilir. Başvurmaktan çekinmeyin.

2-) <https://www.useweb3.xyz/jobs>

Bu site üzerinde Web3 alanında yalnızca yazılım değil; tasarım, business, yazarlık vb. iş ilanlarına ulaşabilirsiniz.

Okuduğunuz için teşekkür ederim, umarım kendi bakış açımı bir nebze dahi olsa açıklayabilmişimdir.

Bana ulaşmak isterseniz: <https://twitter.com/0xabd_>

title: 关于web3做项目的一些窍门
body:
7月币圈活动市场非常不活跃，且预估还会持续不低于半年，因此无法积累收益就专注积累能力。

1. 项目方更倾向于选择优秀的链上用户来发空投；因此，选择一些有趣的平台去进行交互，不仅可以对web3的平台/应用更加熟悉，更可以让自己变的更像一个有经验的合格的Dao成员。例如，gitcoin, ens, snapshot, galaxy project等。
2. 撸毛要有觉悟和奉献精神。明牌空投的毛，多账号撸是基本；有能力可以混个MOD，越接近项目方越好；埋伏类空投，抱着了解项目的心态，不求福报操作几个号即可。
3. 最无能的忙碌就是精力/资金平均分配。因此我们要学会判断项目的前景，决定是多撸还是少撸，是精撸还是粗撸；所以知识体系和对项目的研究能力非常重要。交互一个项目，除了大V们的教程外，自己交互过程中遇到的新名词新概念，延展性的学习一二，当做科普；这些信息会在未来需要精力/资金倾斜的时候帮你作出判断。
4. 参与了几次线下交流，有两个理论提上来执行。1）30%的止损线（不同的人可能自己设置的止损线不同，但从心理行为上来说30%是个砍）如果到了后不止损，大概率已经失去了止损能力。2）熊市应当省吃俭用，省下来的2000在牛市值20000或者更多，即时归零也无所谓反正也是省下来的。（大佬们上一轮熊市开了社群，每日省一顿饭买eos。理论非常好，只不过他买错了eos）。所以按照我的习惯，每月大概2000是没问题的，省1年，牛市就是20万，哦也。
5. 接下来是7月操作总结，无任何亮点：7月举行活动的平台不多，FTX，daomaker有两个活动。FTX由于没有借到FTT没有参加，抽奖型的，平均收益大概在1000刀一个号，号不多的陪跑。daomaker的xana和befitter，我也只参与了后者，表现一般，且我还由于自家的事情错过卖的时机。
6. 8月期待不高，一边撸生活费一边学习。同时继续组队钻研怎么减少多账号的工作量，当前几十套账号就累死了，技术手段能帮上哪些还要继续找大牛学习和研究。

body:
## SMARTLend.finance  —  secure and audited stablecoin lending platform on Binance Smart Chain. Stake BUSD, USDT, USDC, DAI and get stable rewards (1.5% per day).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M7F-e-UNV5tUAK75qiGQt.png?height=1001&width=3001)

### Introducing the SmartLend Project

SMARTLend is a hybrid ROI DApp project that is built on the Binance Smart Chain Network. The developers behind the project chose the Binance Smart Chain network for its larger audience, cheaper transaction fee and matured investors. As ROI Dapps are normally a high-risk investment, choosing Binance Smart Chain community-driven network will be beneficial for investors.

The main aim behind this project is to ensure investors get financial and time freedom without the hindrance created by the current economic crisis. By tapping into the bear cryptocurrency market, SMARTLend is well-positioned to become one of the most sought-after ROI Dapps in the world.

Contract starts on the …

### Features of SmartLend

The SmartLend ROI dApp has a lot of salient features that differentiate it from other ROI Dapps. These include the following:

* Participants can stake any amount above 5 BUSD, USDT, USDC or DAI as there is no maximum capped amount.
* Participants can withdraw the profit without any fee.
* Participants can get 1.5% daily for 70 days. In 70 days the principal is returned. Total profit is 205%
* Participants can trade BNB, BUSD, USDT, USDC, DAI coins in an instant using website interface. 0.5% from each your trade goes as an additional rewards from platform.
* Referral bonus will be sent to wallet automatically.
* SMARTLend provides a functional calculator that easily allows users to calculate profits.
* Earnings every moment, withdraw any time.

### Staking conditions

**The platform has one common plan for all investors:**

1\.5% daily for 70 days

![Staking interface](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IUT3OKmeXSy0Ewub_ZpiF.png?height=669&width=701)

Explanations:

1. Participants can stake BUSD, USDT, USDC, DAI. Min. amount is 5 USD
2. Earnings every second, withdraw earnings at any time. In 70 days the principal is returned. Total profit is 205%.

Example. User A staked 1000 BUSD.

User A gets 15 BUSD every day for 70 days as a rewards.

In 70 days 1000 BUSD is returned to user and immediately available for withdrawal.

Total profit for User A is 2050 BUSD:

* 15 BUSD \* 70 days = 1050 BUSD - rewards from staking
* 1000 BUSD is returned to User A in 70 days

### Swap function

Participants can use swap interface to trade BNB, BUSD, USDC, USDT, DAI coins in an instant:

![Swap interface](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6YrfmxnoTOzTGyII_UARM.png?height=725&width=747)

0\.5% from each your trade goes as an additional rewards from platform. Rewards are locked for 70 days and distributed to you 1.5% daily.

Example. User A swapped 10000 BUSD to USDT:

* User A got 50 BUSD as rewards from platform
* 0.75 BUSD is available to claim for User A every day
* total claimable rewards for User A in 70 days are 102.5 BUSD (52.5 BUSD distributed for 70 days + 50 BUSD is unlocked on 70th day)

### SML token Airdrop

Token info:

* Total supply: 10 000 000 000 SML
* Initial price: $0.1
* BEP20

Token distribution:

* Owners - 1%
* Community - 99%

Admin fee will be used to buyback tokens.

**How to get tokens?** - Stake stablecoins or trade coins using swap function.

**How many tokens can I get?** - tokens for each user is calculated based on simple formulas:

Swap distribution formula: *(swap amount) / 20 = total token airdrop*

*Example. User A swaps 1000 BUSD for USDT. User A gets 50 SML*

Staking distribution formula: *(staked amount) / 2 = total token airdrop*

*Example. User A stakes 1000 BUSD. User A gets 500 SML*

### Affiliate Program

![referral program](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tYCzKqOT1gUR3sRkUbA3Q.png?height=77&width=355)

Investor can get additional income by inviting people to follow your link, You will receive:

* 3% from each level 1 referral deposits
* 2% from each level 2 referral deposits
* 1% from each level 3 referral deposits
* 1% from each level 4 referral deposits
* 0.5% from each level 5 referral deposits

Explanations:

* You need to have at least 1 deposit to start receive earnings
* You need to use your referral link to record the people you refer
* Referral bonus will be sent to your wallet automatically

### Contract details

* **Official Address:** [bscscan.com/address/0xcA7C2bdcA82EcD5ad4E44EBA17020516889c8006](http://bscscan.com/address/0xcA7C2bdcA82EcD5ad4E44EBA17020516889c8006)
* Audit Report 1 : [hazecrypto.net/audit/smartlend](http://hazecrypto.net/audit/smartlend)
* Audit Report 2: [gaudit.org/Audit/34](http://gaudit.org/Audit/34)
* Audit Report 3: [georgestamp.xyz/2022/07/smartlend-finance/](https://georgestamp.xyz/2022/07/smartlend-finance/)
* Contract was deployed on **Binance Smart Chain Network** fast and secured network with very low transactions fees.

### Connecting to SmartLend

* MetaMask can be downloaded on Chrome and Firefox, or on iOS and Android if you’re a mobile user here: <https://metamask.io/download.html>
* Next, follow along with the setup below:
* Network Name: Binance Smart Chain
* Network New RPC URL: <https://bsc-dataseed.binance.org/>
* ChainID: 56
* Symbol: BNB
* Follow this article for step by step guide on connection Metamask to the Binance Smart Chain Network — <https://academy.binance.com/en/articles/connecting-metamask-to-binance-smart-chain>

After you are done with the setup above , then go ahead and Select Settings from the dropdown menu

On the Settings page, we want to locate the Networks menu

Click Add Network in the top-right corner to manually add the **Binance Smart Chain Network**

Once you Save the Network and return to the main view and select **Binance Smart Chain Network** and connect to SmartLend.

title: Zora空投
body:
继LooksRare之后，谁是OpenSea的下一个竞争者？

顶级机构Paradigm投资的Zora是一个不容忽视的存在，原因主要有两点：

（1）股东背景豪华。Paradigm投中的明星项目比比皆是，包括Uniswap、Compound、MakerDAO、dYdX、FTX……兄弟项目的高光表现，无疑会提高市场对Zora的期待值。

（2）Zora尚未发币。1月2日，为庆祝平台上线一周年，Zora发起「ZORB」系列NFT铸造活动，共计56,741枚NFT被用户免费铸造。根据官方介绍，持有NFT=巩固早期支持者身份。这意味着，假如后续有空投，NFT持有者会是重要的目标对象。

概括而言，Zora有知名机构加持，但尚未发行平台代币。未来，如果Zora能用好Crypto这个武器，或许会对OpenSea构成一定威胁。

对于用户而言，完成以下三步，大概率可以拿到来自Zora的空投：

一、**持有ZORB NFT并完成Discord认证（必做）**

↳ 点击<https://discord.zora.co/> 
 ↳ 连接加入 
 ↳ 点击“授权” 
 ↳ 通过点击“以太坊”和“签名”连接你的钱包在你的钱包中弹出 
 ↳ 点击“加入 Discord” 
 ↳ 接受邀请 
 ↳ 完成！你可以点击返回Discord应用程序，角色将被激活

如果你错过了之前的NFT铸造活动，可以考虑直接去市场购买：

[Zorbs NFT Marketplace](https://zora.co/collections/0xCa21d4228cDCc68D4e23807E5e370C07577Dd152)

[Buy, sell and explore Zorbs NFTs](https://zora.co/collections/0xCa21d4228cDCc68D4e23807E5e370C07577Dd152)

[zora.co](https://zora.co/collections/0xCa21d4228cDCc68D4e23807E5e370C07577Dd152)

二、**体验Zora相关产品**

鉴于ZORB NFT数量较多，即使Zora未来有空投，仅持有NFT的领取额度也不多，因此建议多体验其产品（<https://zora.co/>）。

一是刷NFT交易量，有条件的可多刷，步骤跟OpenSea一样，不一一赘述；二是铸造NFT，即点击网站右上角【+】—【Mint new NFT】，按照相关提示完成操作即可。

三、**参与社区治理（必做）**

参考其他项目的空投规则，社区治理也是重要维度。假如你已经持有NFT，建议多参与社区投票等活动。

目前，Zora在snapshot上的首次投票已经结束，后续可持续关注<https://snapshot.org/#/zora.eth>，一旦有新的提案，尽管参与即可。注意：一定要用持有NFT的钱包投票。

当然，完成以上三步不代表你可以100%获得空投，甚至有被反撸的可能性，尤其是步骤2，每一次交互都需要投入不少的Gas费。因此，建议大家量力而行，切勿Fomo。

**关于链上达人：**

区块链原创自媒体，聚焦各类行业热点，自去年12月启动以来，已搭建起相对完善的媒体矩阵：微信公众号、行业媒体专栏（巴比特、火星财经、金色财经、星球日报……）、社交媒体（推特、微博、知乎、币乎……）、社区（微信群、Discord）。

title: 币市整体资金量出现流失 ETH价格上涨的同时存量继续堆积 — 2022.7.30
body:
当前总结：随着七月份各项数据的出炉，加息也已经落地。而且最容易产生恐慌的周六美亚主力交易时区的切换也已经过去了，在ETH合并利好的带动下，BTC和ETH从七月下半月就开启了一路震荡上行的趋势。即便是加息落地和GDP负值以及核心PCE的上升都没有过多的拖累，这一方面是因为经济派对于通胀见顶以及经济衰退预期的实现，另一方面也是因为科技股几支头部的优良业绩，当然也少不了ETH合并的利好。

尤其是最近一直在炒作的分叉ETH的事件，表面上看是对于ETH合并的不信任，而实际上要想获得分叉后新币的空投，就必然需要目前就开始储存ETH的现货，所以分叉闹的越凶，对于当前ETH价格的走势就越好。当然合并后的事情谁也不知道，但在合并前的这段发酵时间引发的FOMO情绪，在目前的环境下仍然将是以震荡为主，从当前的资金形式来看，仍然还是以圈内资金为主，外部资金尚未出现明显的增加迹象。

而且不但是没有明显的增加，甚至是代表美国主力资金的USDC反而在加息数据出现后连续的出现减持的迹象，从加息前到现在已经减少了将近3亿美金，而以欧洲资金为主的USDT则增加了1亿美金，说明当前币圈的资金总量不但没有增加，反而还是出现了外流。

Twitter @ Phyrex_Ni

截止到今天下午15点30分的BTC持仓分布，从昨天晚上美股开盘前到现在的数据，虽然获取的时间段比较长，但依然可以清晰的看到，除了当前的争端价格有强力的波动外，其它总体的BTC链上地址依然保持着较低的地址变化，从两边的极端价格来看，远古持仓的BTC减持量仅580枚都不到。

而高位套牢的筹码虽然转移量稍多一些，但是经过交叉对比56,000美金附近的近1,500枚BTC的波动更加有可能是交易所的互转行为，所以实际上高位套牢筹码的减持也仅不到350枚，同样处于正常的波动范围。而24,000美金上方的整体亏损筹码减持不到8,000枚BTC，除去个别价位有可能是交易所的互转外，实际产生的地址变化也相对处于正常范畴。

抛压的重点依然是来自于当前的争端价格，尤其是随着周末的到来，出于对连续两次产生过的周六恐慌，依然可以看到出现了大量的近期抄底的筹码纷纷转入交易所，寻求出场的机会，尤其是20,000美金下方已经许久未动的获利BTC都出现了转移的状态。更多的参与到了换手的行列。

从转入到交易所的BTC数据中可以看到，截止到今天早晨八点的日线数据中显示出连续两日BTC的抛压已经是近期的高点了，相比昨天同期，虽然有稍许的下降，但难掩高涨抛售的情绪，尤其是随着价格的上升，大量的获利筹码已经按捺不住对于价格继续上涨的看衰，纷纷的准备或已经离场，直到今天早晨八点过后才逐渐的降低抛压。

而从细节数据来看，从早晨九点开始一直到北京时间的下午十六点前都没有出现大量的减持迹象，这一方面说明周末低流通量已经开始生效，主力资金和主力抛压都开始离场，另一方面也预示着这个周六无惊无险的度过了。而周日相对周六则安全了很多。

相对于连续较高的抛压来说，截止到今天早晨八点的从交易所转出的BTC数据就比较骇人了，回看本周的数据其实可以知道，因为有CPI，GDP和PCE数据的现货出台，周内一直是抛压大于转出的，更多的筹码都会选择在数据公布前将BTC转移到交易所，为了防止出现价格崩溃后出现出售不急的情况，而从今天早晨的数据来看，不论是新产生的购买力，还是之前转入交易所的筹码又重新转出，都可以看到远超于今天抛压的BTC转出了交易所。

前边我们看到转入的数据中表现出大量的近期获利筹码的离场，那么转出除了新购买的BTC外，应该就是之前转入交易所的筹码现在觉得价格不错，或者是看好后期的走势而选择提现回钱包，毕竟从目前的整体资金量来看，当前的资金量并不支持这么大量的购买。

通过交易所的存量数据也可以发现，今天凌晨出现的转出继续缩减着交易所内的库存。但目前还没有出现明确的欧洲人购买的趋势，不过按照以往周末的数据来看，晚上20点左右应该还会迎来一次资金进入的高峰。

不但BTC是这样，即便是ETH的走势也和BTC类似，主要是因为宏观情况的落地，经过两个的考验后基本已经稳定，所以购买力或者说是对于下一个博弈阶段前的市场还是相对稳定的，从目前来看，下一次可能会对局面造成影响的就是8月10日公布出的七月CPI的数据。而这次的数据基本上可以认定为是经济派与通胀派最大的一场博弈了。

不过从细节数据来看，都能发现，今天凌晨到上午的抛压都还是挺大的只有到了上午九点过后抛压才开始小起来，这也说明了亚洲市场的主力交易并没有太大的砸盘期望，但因为周末流通量降低的原因依然会存在少量筹码可以砸盘，少量资金可以拉盘的情况，所以价格未必会很稳定，震荡依然是主旋律。

相对BTC来说，ETH的交易所存量仍然是处于危险的地步，虽然凌晨和BTC同样都出现了较大的提现行为，但是BTC目前距离近三年的最低存量只有一步之遥，而目前ETH的交易所存量，别说距离最低值了，就连LUNA事件时的高峰存量都没有度过，所以相对BTC来说，ETH的风险性要更高。

尤其是当前ETH的获利筹码较多，而且完全就是依靠合并的利好来维持情绪。

从整体的资金层面来看，截止到今天早晨八点转入交易所的USDT和USDC相对于前一天的变化并不大，只是USDT转入的更多了一些，而USDC相对减少一些，总的水平还是相差无几。但通过连续两周的资金对比可以看到，本周的资金量相对于上周来说，差距还是很大的，但是却往上升了一截，这是一个很明显的信号。

当前的价格上升是基于之前购买的筹码少量出售的原因，说人话就是上周开始抄底的筹码出于对价格上升的预期而没有过多的出售手中的筹码，才会导致即便是相比减少的资金还是可以将价格拉升，这已经不仅仅是因为ETH合并的利好，还有价格上升的带来的期望。

这也代表了如果价格处于持续上涨的状态，那么获利筹码只会缓慢的离场，不会对当前的价格有太大的影响，但如果更多的人不看好后市的价格走势，那么一旦价格崩溃就会出现连锁反应。谨慎合约，降低杠杆还是目前最有效的防范方式。

通过目前BTC的永续合约数据来看，资金费率虽然还是处于看多的趋势，但是已经从高点持续的下降了，这也说明当前上涨的价格已经出乎了很多投资者的预料，甚至认为很难维持一直的上涨，所以看空的情绪将会逐渐的增加。但从宏观角度来看，起码8月10日之前不会有太大的变化了。

尤其是当前的美金指数受到加息的影响还没体现，反而更多的还是和欧元的汇率在镜像同步，欧元在加息中缓慢的上升，以及对于美国经济衰退的预期也降低了美金的估值，美金见顶相对来说也是一件好事。

而从美债的殖利率方面来看，出现了比较明显的分歧，短期美债的殖利率开始上升，而中长期美债的殖利率处于下降的趋势，更多的资金开始从短期的美债中撤离，而选择加入长期美债的怀抱，这也是因为对于美国经济衰退的担忧，尤其是两年期的美债和十年期美债的收益在倒挂在大幅的增加，目前的差值已经扩大到23个基点以上，表现出对美联储的更加不信任。

title: Paradigm Shift of Private Investment in China
body:
*I have been trying to develop my framework as a traditional investors at this changing juncture over the past \~12 months. After the recent shocking events, I finally have a chance to look back and summarize my chain of thinking here* 

**The Death of US Dollar Funds**  

Music suddenly stopped in 2022 for most China focused (and global) tech investors, who have long enjoyed the golden age of the "network efforts" of mobile internet for the past decade. However, I am probably not the only one see this coming inevitably. As a matter of fact, growth and penetration already started to plateau around 2019 resulted from the over-competition stimulated with excessive capital (mostly from the unprecedented historical-long bull market or in Su Zhu’s term “super-cycle"). 

Covid and the subsequent simulation package during late-2019-2020 dosed those investors with the illusion that party was still going on. Either blinded enough or refuse to accept the fact, people obsessed with the epic v-shape come back of tech stocks as well as cryptocurrencies post March 2020 collapse, which reminded me of the sensational scenes in the movie “the Great Gatsby” and “the Wolf of Wall Street”, everyone (including me of course) looked like genius and believed himself / herself as smart and powerful as Bobby Axelord in the 2020-2021 bull market until the last guy catching the spray of blossom and Chase Coleman (who I respect a lot) became the poster-child of the meltdown of long-tail unprofitable tech companies.  

I have long been concerned about the flaw in the business model of “growth equity” in China even in the pre-covid years. The imbalance between demand for capital deployment and supply of high quality assets in China has been remained for years. It is for sure a seller’s market. One obvious evidence is the emergence of so-called “FA” like mushrooms after rain. Copied from China Renaissance model, couples of new entities were set up over the past 5 years often with wired names ended up with “Capital”. They have the similar playbook - dressing up startups, dazzling around investors, creating FOMO and maximizing valuation for each round. They are the arbitragers of the imbalance and earned fat fees.

It’s a seller’s market and a polarized one. Assets are either too early to properly analyze or too expensive if any sign of early success. It’s also polarized in the way top institutions, namely Hillhouse and Sequoia monopolized the deal flow. Growth investors left with a wired situation having to bet on un-consensus or sometimes controversial companies and inevitably become a "stock picker”. This put a high bar for growth investors, which I really enjoy and am proud of my investments. However, this is not a sustainable model for a PE fund, as “stock picker” doesn’t have operating leverage, unlike early stage VC investor who can "spray-and-pray” a sector and build a ecosystem and late stage PE investor who can maximize its platform effect with deep-pocket, investment of growth investors are often scattered, which means unlikely to be repeated, unless you are a specialist in some high-barrier areas, e.g. biotech and semiconductor. 

**As a result, it’s become a beta game. Wining factor is really the ability to get the capital deployed. However, everything has a beginning has an end.** 

Thanks to Jerome Powell’s mishandling of Fed policies, coupled with geopolitic and covid uncertainties, inflation got out of control and caught most of the hyped investors off guard (me included of course). Looking back, it is obvious and inevitable as Fed has been dancing at the edge with razor-thin margin for error. I remembered Mohamed El-Erian long called Fed out on CNBC, but people (me included of course) tended to ignore and cheered for Chamath Palihapitiya and Tom Lee’s “everything rally”. Sadly, it’s just human nature.

However, what really sealed the coffin for China-focused US dollar funds happened long before that. One public signal might dated back to the October 2020 speech. Some people still feel sympathy and argue the subsequent policies suppressed innovation, which is really the sadness part about those so-called investors last cycle that will talk about in next chapter. I find these as hilarious as media's rhetoric using “crackdown” for China while using “regulate” when western regulators are doing basically the same thing. People with basic understanding of modern financial system will find the speech blatant. That marked the beginning of the end. 

In my opinion, change of theme of the generation is the ultimate fundamental that sentenced that death of those funds. When I grow up, I remembered clearly the textbook says “peach and prosperity is the theme of our generation”. Time has changed. Whether you admit or not "competition and conflict” has been and will continue to be the theme for at least next 5 years. It’s naive and wishful thinking to compare with the old glory days, as we are essentially in a modern war or put in a mild term global competition. In peaceful time, no harm to invest “new economy companies” as a n icing on the cake, who can help people live better, but now we are at a time to prioritize national interest and invest companies that make sure that we could live out of this competition.

If you agree with this logic, it will not be hard for you to land on the conclusion on what will be the area to focus for the next 5 years, i.e. new energy, new materials and advanced manufacturing. It’s cannot be too exaggeration to say that new energy, specially EV, stays at the very core of our national interest and long-term strategy, as it not only can help China reduce reliance on fossil fuel but also stimulate the development of advanced manufacturing. Sadly, most of these sectors are RMB investment logic, where spoilt US dollar investors normally don’t have an edge on. 

What’s worse, the effectively closure of US listing (triggered by the ridiculously irresponsible management of Didi Global) of Chinese ADR kicked off the death spiral (although not as violent as Luna/Terra), as exit of those lofty investments are blocked, hence no DPI. Even, those caught the 1H21 bus, stock price were slumped as public market investors hardhearted gave them a reality check. Terrible DPI flow back and enhance the already difficult fundraising process as US LPs are taking a pause on China market given geopolitical concerns.

 
 I don’t see this spiral to break in the near term.

**The Lost “Superstars”**

When I articulated my thinking above in Feb this year to a group of audience, it was regarded as laughable. I was not embarrassed but found them pathetic. Maybe I am arrogant, but quite a few investors and entrepreneurs in the last cycle didn’t think enough about the famous question - is it really great times create successful men / women or great men / women create successful times, I personally tend to think it is the former. 

As I explained, in the first chapter, the golden ages of the past few years is largely a beta driven seller market. As a result, narrowly defined "stock picking capability" is not necessary to become a top-tier investor, but ability to close deals is essential to climb to the top of the ladder. I am not judging but it is a result of a natural selection process that those with charismatic personality and extensive network become the superstars of that age. 

Same as for entrepreneurs, with all due respect for the entrepreneurship, I found only very few top quality founders really understand what exactly made them and their company successful. Often times, entrepreneurs  think A, B and C were the key factors that make their companies stand out, but actually are D and E. This also explain the cases of fast followers who think they can catch-up or even do better (as they also have A, B and C) but mostly failed eventually. 

It was the best time for US dollar investors as they share similar background with founders of new economy companies. It is not hard to imaging the on top of the world feeling that George Yang described in his “not invest in China” letter cherishing the memory spent with the “new rich”.  

In the gold rush days of the boom of “new economy” companies, I found quite a few investors obsessed with vision and growth story that largely romanticize the purpose of the investment. Everyone suddenly become litterateur full of theories with invented words, fly-wheel effect, freemium model, to name a few. To be China’s L’oreal was the core thesis for investment of Perfect Diary (I bought in as well unfortunately) and people feel excited. P/S or even more exotic multiples are invented to justify lofty valuations. What a crazy time! 

Paradigm shift of technologies and companies are widely discussed among investors, but less about paradigm also shifting in investment industry at the same time. 

As the market turn bearish, the beta diminish. As Warren Buffett’s famous saying goes “only when the tide goes out do you discover who has been swimming naked”. Admitted or not, the magic quickly went away. Some people accept that and either adapt, cut loss or leave. Only the ones refused to accept the fact and hold down to the wire burning him / herself to the ground. Again I found this group of people pathetic - instead of being grateful for what great times have made them, they complain about the policies and think about fleeing the country. Good luck homeless cur. 

It is the worst of time. A brutal wake-up call.  
  
  
 **The Return of A-share Logic** 

 
 For the ones that adapt, actively or passively, new energy, new materials and advanced manufacturing become the battle field. Same medicine differently prepared, the new hype emerged with same rush even with a newly invented fancy name "hard tech”. I like the word “hard tech” and “frontier tech” as it summarized well of the theme for the next 5 years, but it is hard for most people. 

I call it the death of US dollar fund, not only because most of the hard tech deals are RMB friendly (can resolve technically), but more that logic investing these companies are fundamentally different. 

You may ask why Chinese companies prefers to list overseas. Yes, underdevelopment of domestic capital market is an important reason. However, it is also because for “new economy companies“ to maximize the network effects, growth are oftentimes prioritized at the expenses of profitability. In order to maintain faster-than-competitor growth, strong demand for capital hence lead to the prosperity of private investment, especially growth capital. However, profitability can be delayed but not avoided. One of the major criteria failed new economy companies listing in domestic market is indeed profitability. 

Expect for several frontier tech companies, this set of companies are what we call real business. Founders may not have fancy resumes as those new economy companies and may not envision an exciting story; most of these companies are profitable and less desired for capital. 

Participating investors are also different. Might be not dressed in fancy suits and talking blended Chinese and English, most people literally sit on supply chain to get the first hand data to fill in the model. The intensity and tenacity is just at another level.  
  
 This is where we are. Welcome to the new paradigm. 

 
 *(I will discuss my thinking on how to better transition in this new paradigm in another article)*

title: Celestia: A New Paradigm in Blockchain Scalability
body:
### A Few Core Concepts

Now before we get into Celestia, we have to talk about a few terms and concepts that are going to be very important in understanding the things discussed in this write-up going forward. First, understand that every blockchain has to do 3 core functions; **consensus**, **execution** and **data availability**.

* **Consensus** is how everyone in the network agrees on what transactions have happened and in what order, thus ordering the transactions into a history of events.
* **Execution** is the interpretation of those transactions. Determining what transactions are valid and how they impact and update the **state**.

  A **state** or **state transition** is something that occurs each time a block is accepted in the blockchain.
* **Data availability** refers to the ability for transaction data to be made available for nodes to download so that anyone in the blockchain can identify and read the state transition.

What Celestia does is that it separates these core functions.

Their official website describes **Celestia as a modular consensus and data network, built to enable anyone to easily deploy their own blockchain with minimal overhead**

*Now what does that mean?*

Well, Celestia is the first **modular** blockchain network, and modular blockchains are essentially what cloud computing is in Web2. Let’s dive deeper into it.


---

### Modular vs Monolithic Architecture

Every blockchain that has ever been built so far is monolithic or uses monolithic architecture, meaning that the core functions mentioned before, consensus and execution, both happen at the same time and are enforced by the same set of validators. Monolithic architecture is, in a way, a bottleneck that limits scalability as a full node has to execute **every single transaction**.

Celestia, being a **modular** blockchain network, uses modular architecture which separates or “decouples” the blockchain stack into more specialized components. Meaning that by using modular architecture, the core functions, consensus and execution, are separated into different layers. So one layer can be dedicated solely to consensus and another layer can be dedicated to execution.

*So why is modular supposedly better than monolithic?*

![source: Celestia Labs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5yIOA3J84QQEur52tWwO0.png?height=778&width=1320)

In the picture above, the visual on the left shows monolithic architecture, where both the consensus and execution functions are bundled into one layer and then a smart contract is built on top of that bundled layer. With monolithic architecture, you’re bound within one execution environment, limiting its potential to specialize and optimize for certain use cases.

The visual on the right shows Celestia’s modular architecture where you’ve separated the consensus and execution functions into separate layers, now the execution layer can exist as its own blockchain, where they can define their own state transition functions while also specializing and optimizing for certain use cases. This modular architecture or modular blockchain allows for better scalability, security and flexibility for any decentralized application built on it. We’ll get into the details of that soon.


---

### Celestia’s Scalability

In Ethereum, any individual with a laptop or computer can run a full Ethereum node, but it’s not really scalable because as more transactions are processed and the size of a block is increased, it becomes increasingly resource-intensive, meaning you would need better resources like higher hardware requirements i.e. a faster, more advanced computer, and not everyone has access or is able to acquire better resources, thus presenting a massive scalability issue.

This is what Celestia solves. Since it decouples (separates) consensus and execution, **a full node in Celestia doesn’t have to execute every transaction that happens**, it just reads every transaction as raw data. All it needs to make sure is that the transaction data in the block is available.

Now to verify data availability, the traditional approach would be to download all the data in the block. But then a problem occurs that as a block gets bigger, you’d face the same problem mentioned before where you'd then need better resources i.e. higher hardware requirements like a faster, more advanced computer and bigger data storage, thus limiting scalability.

To solve this scalability issue, Celestia came up with **Data Availability Sampling**. Rather than downloading the entire transaction data of a block, Data Availability Sampling allows you to sample small, random chunks of that block and once you’ve sampled enough of them, you’d have probabilistic certainty that the whole block is available.

Let’s use a simple example to help understand this concept better. Imagine you’re presented with 10 Gigabytes of data, instead of having to download the entire 10 Gigabytes to make sure that the data is there, with Data Availability Sampling you’d only need to download 100 Megabytes of that data and then you’ll know with 99.9% certainty that the entire data is available, thus solving the scalability issue of needing better resources as you’d only be downloading a small chunk or small percentage of that data instead of the entire thing.

What’s even crazier (in a good way) about how scalable this can be is that you can run Data Availability Sampling on a mobile phone, as shown by [Mustafa](https://twitter.com/musalbas), Celestia Labs’ CEO on [one of his Twitter posts](https://twitter.com/musalbas/status/1480901457633239048).

Now, in case you’re still having a hard time understanding Data Availability Sampling, I made this illustration below that will hopefully help you get a better grasp of this concept.

**Without Data Availability Sampling**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oT6AGs-1BS0ywT8ZnUqmn.png?height=384&width=538)

Okay so without Data Availability Sampling, in order to verify data availability, Pepo here would have to download the entire transaction data of a block. Initially it goes alright for him as his hardware (laptop) is able to keep up with the demands of processing the transaction data of the block. Now as Pepo wants to start scaling and starts processing more transactions, the size of the block increases. Pepo then realizes that his hardware is now unable to keep up with the increasing requirements necessary for scaling. Pepo is now unable to scale.

**With Data Availability Sampling**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qo5W5mkS8vEArgio-ShG-.png?height=714&width=976)

Now with Data Availability Sampling, Pepo only needs to sample a small, random chunk of data instead of the whole thing in order to verify data availability. The process is now not as hardware-intensive as before and requires fewer resources, thus Pepo is now able to scale.

*Okay, other than better scalability, what other reasons are there for dApps to launch on Celestia?*

A few notable advantages I found for building on Celestia is the flexibility and sovereignty it offers. Let’s say a dApp is built on, for example, the Ethereum network, developers are then “stuck” within the limitations in its EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) which then restricts and limits the devs from being able to do certain things, limiting their original vision. On the other hand, building on Celestia provides developers with greater flexibility where they can deploy not only on EVM, but also Cosmos SDK, Substrate and other execution environments like any IBC-enabled zone, freeing them from the limitations of a single chain.


---

### Wen Token?

Alright, I’m guessing this might be the most anticipated part of this write-up for some. Unfortunately, the Celestia team has not specified when they might be launching a token, but don’t worry, a token IS coming.

Now despite there being no information as of yet of when a token for Celestia might launch, [Nick White](https://twitter.com/nickwh8te), COO of Celestia Labs, has given out some information on how and what the token might be like and what it might be used for in his [interview](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1271355438) with [BigD_Senpai](https://twitter.com/bigdsenpai). He mentioned that the Celestia token can be used for staking and delegating, earning inflationary rewards, and will also be what is used to pay for posting data on the blockchain and making it available.

For comparison, where in Ethereum you pay gas in ETH tokens to run computation on a shared EVM computer, in Celestia, using it’s native Celestia token, you pay per byte of data that you want to post. So the Celestia token for Celestia will be similar to what ETH is to Ethereum. They are also planning to implement a fee-burning mechanism similar to EIP-1559, bringing a deflationary aspect to the token. Nick also notes that as long as there is significant demand for secure, decentralized blockspace for people to run whatever decentralized computing they want, there will be significant demand for the Celestia token.


---

### Closing Thoughts

Modular blockchains have the potential to introduce a new paradigm shift in how decentralized applications are built as it improves upon the flaws and limitations of monolithic architecture, and in the face of this new paradigm shift, at the forefront of it, is Celestia.

Despite mainnet being months away from launching, Celestia has garnered a lot of attention and hype, and with its potential and what it promises to bring to the space, I’d say the attention and hype is warranted. Backed with a star-studded team and promising new innovations, if you’re a believer in the future of secure, decentralized blockspace and modular blockchains, I don’t see why you wouldn’t be a believer in Celestia.


---

*Thanks for reading! If you want to get notified about future posts or give any input/feedback, [subscribe](https://mirror.xyz/knarb.eth) and follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_knarb). Or don’t. It’s up to you.*

*This article was first published on 24 January 2022 in Substack. Minor edits were made in formatting, descriptions based on the updated Celestia website and any mentions of “Web3” were replaced because I don’t like that term. Just a personal preference.*

**Living in accordance with nature.**

*The following is a collection of Stoic thoughts and anecdotes I’ve been aggregating over the years. I use this as part of my daily morning routine to prepare for the day. I keep this in my [Bear app](https://bear.app/) and have been meaning to back it up in the off-chance I lose access to Bear; [Mirror](https://mirror.xyz) is the ideal home for my collection. [Now that I have some free time on my hands](https://techcrunch.com/2022/07/14/nft-marketplace-opensea-lays-off-20-percent-of-its-staff-we-have-entered-crypto-winter/), there is no better time than the present to tackle this—my [Reserve Clause](https://whatisstoicism.com/stoicism-definition/what-is-the-stoic-reserve-clause/#:\~:text=The%20Stoic%20reserve%20clause%20is,if%20something%20does%20go%20wrong.).*

> “Begin the morning by saying to yourself, I shall meet with the busybody, the ungrateful, arrogant, deceitful, envious, unsocial. All these things happen to them because of their ignorance of what is good and evil. But I who have seen that the nature of the good is beautiful, and that the bad is ugly, and that the nature of he who does wrong is akin to me, not only of the same blood or seed, but that it participates in the same intelligence and the same portion of the divinity, I can neither be injured by any of them, for no one can fix on me what is ugly, nor can I be angry with my kinsman, nor hate him, For we are made for cooperation, like feet, like hands, like eyelids, like the rows of the upper and lower teeth. To act against one another then is contrary to nature and it is acting against one another to become frustrated and to turn away..” *– Marcus Aurelius*

**A Stoic believes they don’t control the world around them, only how they respond —and must always respond with courage, temperance, Wisdom, and Justice.**

**Four virtues**

\[ \] Wisdom

\[ \] Justice

\[ \] Courage

\[ \] Discipline

**Suspended judgment.**

[Take the view from above](https://www.orionphilosophy.com/stoic-blog/view-from-above).

**Why am I doing this? Will I regret it?**

Strive for Equanimity.

> “In your actions, don't procrastinate. In your conversations, don't confuse. In your thoughts, don't wander. In your soul, don't be passive or aggressive. In your life, don't be all about business.” *- Marcus Aurelius*

## 12 Rules for (a Stoic) Life

1/ Live as if you died but were resuscitated, and every minute was a gift.  Memento Mori, which is translated from Latin, means “Remember that you will die.”

2/ **Every person you meet is an opportunity for kindness.**

3/ Don’t read for show; read[ to be better](https://el2.convertkit-mail.com/c/mvuv62epgb5h9vv84/opfkhq/aHR0cDovL2RhaWx5c3RvaWMuY29tL3N0b2ljLXJlYWRpbmctbGlzdA==).

4/ Be forgiving of others, but [don’t demand forgiveness for yourself](https://el2.convertkit-mail.com/c/mvuv62epgb5h9vv84/zvtghn/aHR0cHM6Ly9kYWlseXN0b2ljLmNvbS9naXZlLWZvcmdpdmVuZXNzLWRvbnQtYXNrLWZvci1pdC8_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1jb252ZXJ0a2l0JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09Y29udmVydGtpdCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249MTItcnVsZXM=). Hold yourself to a very high standard, and don’t make excuses when you fail to meet it.

5/ Try to hold [as few opinions as possible](https://el2.convertkit-mail.com/c/mvuv62epgb5h9vv84/pnceh9/aHR0cHM6Ly9kYWlseXN0b2ljLmNvbS9jdXJzZS1vcGluaW9uLWV2ZXJ5dGhpbmcvP3V0bV9zb3VyY2U9Y29udmVydGtpdCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWNvbnZlcnRraXQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPTEyLXJ1bGVz).

6/ Pick a “ [Cato](https://el2.convertkit-mail.com/c/mvuv62epgb5h9vv84/xksph6/aHR0cDovL2RhaWx5c3RvaWMuY29tL0NhdG8_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1jb252ZXJ0a2l0JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09Y29udmVydGtpdCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249MTItcnVsZXM=) ” and judge each difficult decision with: **“What Would ____ Do?”**

7/ Practice good spending habits (***keep in touch with poverty***). 

8/ Always [consider the worst-case scenario](https://el2.convertkit-mail.com/c/mvuv62epgb5h9vv84/60aeh8/aHR0cDovL2RhaWx5c3RvaWMuY29tL3ByZW1vcnRlbS8_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1jb252ZXJ0a2l0JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09Y29udmVydGtpdCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249MTItcnVsZXM=). 

9/ Keep a list of what you’ve learned from other people (**and remember to thank them often**). 

10/ Get up early every day—as early as you can. 

11/ Take cold showers. 

12/ **If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.** 

[https://dailystoic.com/12-rules-stoic-life/](https://dailystoic.com/12-rules-stoic-life/)

 
 

**\[1\] Train Your Perceptions**
**\[2\] Turn The Other Cheek**
**\[3\] View Obstacles as Opportunities**
**\[4\] Love Your Fate**
**\[5\] Compare Your Life To Eternity**

[Amor Fati](https://dailystoic.com/amor-fati-love-of-fate/), which is translated from Latin, means  **[love of one’s fate](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3C-rTDEp6oU)**

[Memento Mori](https://dailystoic.com/memento-mori/), which is translated from Latin, means **“Remember that you will die.”**

> **Stoicism is the OS for life.**
>
> See things for what they are.
> Do what we can.
> Endure and bare what must.
> What blocks your path is now a path.
> “The **impediment** to **action** advances **action**. What stands in the way **becomes** the way.” [The Obstacle Is the Way](https://www.amazon.com/Obstacle-Way-Timeless-Turning-Triumph/dp/1591846358) *- Ryan Holiday*

Focus on what I control.

**Dive deep into what I control and modify my aversion to be the best person, courage to be kind, temperance to avoid negative responses, and Wisdom to live another day.**

*View the situation, and analyze and empathize as though I was an outsider giving feedback*.

**Equanimity** - mental calmness, composure, and evenness of temper, especially in a difficult situation.

***My thoughts, not the outcome, are under my control.***

When you experience a distressing or problematic thought, pause, and tell yourself: **“This is just a thought and not at all the thing it claims to represent.”**  Remind yourself that it is not things that upset you but your judgments about things. Try to postpone responding to them for at least an hour, waiting until your feelings have settled down and you are able to view things more calmly and objectively before deciding what action to take.

# The Three Disciplines

**1/ “The Discipline of Desire,” which has to do with acceptance of our fate.  
 2/ “The Discipline of Action,” which has to do with philanthropy or love of mankind.  
 3/ “The Discipline of Assent,” which has to do with mindfulness of our judgments.**

[https://donaldrobertson.name/2013/02/20/introduction-to-stoicism-the-three-disciplines/](https://donaldrobertson.name/2013/02/20/introduction-to-stoicism-the-three-disciplines/)

```
You only control yourself.
Nothing that happens can hurt you.
Change is natural.
Amor Fati
Memento mori
```

Practice:
• Wisdom - the ability to differentiate between what’s truly good and bad.
• Justice - the capacity to treat people fairly and kindly.
• Courage - proficiency in acting well despite fear or aversion to externals.
• Temperance - skill in reducing desire for external things that aren’t in your complete control.

Control your perceptions.
Direct your actions properly.
Willingly accept what’s outside your control.

> **Randomly choose two people and silently wish for them to be happy.** 
>
> [Search Inside Yourself: The Unexpected Path to Achieving Success, Happiness (and World Peace)](https://www.amazon.com/Search-Inside-Yourself-Unexpected-Achieving/dp/0062116932) - Chade-Meng Tan

**Read and do this every day so I can become a better person.**

title: Celestia: A New Paradigm in Blockchain Scalability
body:
### A Few Core Concepts

Now before we get into Celestia, we have to talk about a few terms and concepts that are going to be very important in understanding the things discussed in this write-up going forward. First, understand that every blockchain has to do 3 core functions; **consensus**, **execution** and **data availability**.

* **Consensus** is how everyone in the network agrees on what transactions have happened and in what order, thus ordering the transactions into a history of events.
* **Execution** is the interpretation of those transactions. Determining what transactions are valid and how they impact and update the **state**.

  A **state** or **state transition** is something that occurs each time a block is accepted in the blockchain.
* **Data availability** refers to the ability for transaction data to be made available for nodes to download so that anyone in the blockchain can identify and read the state transition.

What Celestia does is that it separates these core functions.

Their official website describes **Celestia as a modular consensus and data network, built to enable anyone to easily deploy their own blockchain with minimal overhead**

*Now what does that mean?*

Well, Celestia is the first **modular** blockchain network, and modular blockchains are essentially what cloud computing is in Web2. Let’s dive deeper into it.


---

### Modular vs Monolithic Architecture

Every blockchain that has ever been built so far is monolithic or uses monolithic architecture, meaning that the core functions mentioned before, consensus and execution, both happen at the same time and are enforced by the same set of validators. Monolithic architecture is, in a way, a bottleneck that limits scalability as a full node has to execute **every single transaction**.

Celestia, being a **modular** blockchain network, uses modular architecture which separates or “decouples” the blockchain stack into more specialized components. Meaning that by using modular architecture, the core functions, consensus and execution, are separated into different layers. So one layer can be dedicated solely to consensus and another layer can be dedicated to execution.

*So why is modular supposedly better than monolithic?*

![source: Celestia Labs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5yIOA3J84QQEur52tWwO0.png?height=778&width=1320)

In the picture above, the visual on the left shows monolithic architecture, where both the consensus and execution functions are bundled into one layer and then a smart contract is built on top of that bundled layer. With monolithic architecture, you’re bound within one execution environment, limiting its potential to specialize and optimize for certain use cases.

The visual on the right shows Celestia’s modular architecture where you’ve separated the consensus and execution functions into separate layers, now the execution layer can exist as its own blockchain, where they can define their own state transition functions while also specializing and optimizing for certain use cases. This modular architecture or modular blockchain allows for better scalability, security and flexibility for any decentralized application built on it. We’ll get into the details of that soon.


---

### Celestia’s Scalability

In Ethereum, any individual with a laptop or computer can run a full Ethereum node, but it’s not really scalable because as more transactions are processed and the size of a block is increased, it becomes increasingly resource-intensive, meaning you would need better resources like higher hardware requirements i.e. a faster, more advanced computer, and not everyone has access or is able to acquire better resources, thus presenting a massive scalability issue.

This is what Celestia solves. Since it decouples (separates) consensus and execution, **a full node in Celestia doesn’t have to execute every transaction that happens**, it just reads every transaction as raw data. All it needs to make sure is that the transaction data in the block is available.

Now to verify data availability, the traditional approach would be to download all the data in the block. But then a problem occurs that as a block gets bigger, you’d face the same problem mentioned before where you'd then need better resources i.e. higher hardware requirements like a faster, more advanced computer and bigger data storage, thus limiting scalability.

To solve this scalability issue, Celestia came up with **Data Availability Sampling**. Rather than downloading the entire transaction data of a block, Data Availability Sampling allows you to sample small, random chunks of that block and once you’ve sampled enough of them, you’d have probabilistic certainty that the whole block is available.

Let’s use a simple example to help understand this concept better. Imagine you’re presented with 10 Gigabytes of data, instead of having to download the entire 10 Gigabytes to make sure that the data is there, with Data Availability Sampling you’d only need to download 100 Megabytes of that data and then you’ll know with 99.9% certainty that the entire data is available, thus solving the scalability issue of needing better resources as you’d only be downloading a small chunk or small percentage of that data instead of the entire thing.

What’s even crazier (in a good way) about how scalable this can be is that you can run Data Availability Sampling on a mobile phone, as shown by [Mustafa](https://twitter.com/musalbas), Celestia Labs’ CEO on [one of his Twitter posts](https://twitter.com/musalbas/status/1480901457633239048).

Now, in case you’re still having a hard time understanding Data Availability Sampling, I made this illustration below that will hopefully help you get a better grasp of this concept.

**Without Data Availability Sampling**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oT6AGs-1BS0ywT8ZnUqmn.png?height=384&width=538)

Okay so without Data Availability Sampling, in order to verify data availability, Pepo here would have to download the entire transaction data of a block. Initially it goes alright for him as his hardware (laptop) is able to keep up with the demands of processing the transaction data of the block. Now as Pepo wants to start scaling and starts processing more transactions, the size of the block increases. Pepo then realizes that his hardware is now unable to keep up with the increasing requirements necessary for scaling. Pepo is now unable to scale.

**With Data Availability Sampling**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qo5W5mkS8vEArgio-ShG-.png?height=714&width=976)

Now with Data Availability Sampling, Pepo only needs to sample a small, random chunk of data instead of the whole thing in order to verify data availability. The process is now not as hardware-intensive as before and requires fewer resources, thus Pepo is now able to scale.

*Okay, other than better scalability, what other reasons are there for dApps to launch on Celestia?*

A few notable advantages I found for building on Celestia is the flexibility and sovereignty it offers. Let’s say a dApp is built on, for example, the Ethereum network, developers are then “stuck” within the limitations in its EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) which then restricts and limits the devs from being able to do certain things, limiting their original vision. On the other hand, building on Celestia provides developers with greater flexibility where they can deploy not only on EVM, but also Cosmos SDK, Substrate and other execution environments like any IBC-enabled zone, freeing them from the limitations of a single chain.


---

### Wen Token?

Alright, I’m guessing this might be the most anticipated part of this write-up for some. Unfortunately, the Celestia team has not specified when they might be launching a token, but don’t worry, a token IS coming.

Now despite there being no information as of yet of when a token for Celestia might launch, [Nick White](https://twitter.com/nickwh8te), COO of Celestia Labs, has given out some information on how and what the token might be like and what it might be used for in his [interview](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1271355438) with [BigD_Senpai](https://twitter.com/bigdsenpai). He mentioned that the Celestia token can be used for staking and delegating, earning inflationary rewards, and will also be what is used to pay for posting data on the blockchain and making it available.

For comparison, where in Ethereum you pay gas in ETH tokens to run computation on a shared EVM computer, in Celestia, using it’s native Celestia token, you pay per byte of data that you want to post. So the Celestia token for Celestia will be similar to what ETH is to Ethereum. They are also planning to implement a fee-burning mechanism similar to EIP-1559, bringing a deflationary aspect to the token. Nick also notes that as long as there is significant demand for secure, decentralized blockspace for people to run whatever decentralized computing they want, there will be significant demand for the Celestia token.


---

### Closing Thoughts

Modular blockchains have the potential to introduce a new paradigm shift in how decentralized applications are built as it improves upon the flaws and limitations of monolithic architecture, and in the face of this new paradigm shift, at the forefront of it, is Celestia.

Despite mainnet being months away from launching, Celestia has garnered a lot of attention and hype, and with its potential and what it promises to bring to the space, I’d say the attention and hype is warranted. Backed with a star-studded team and promising new innovations, if you’re a believer in the future of secure, decentralized blockspace and modular blockchains, I don’t see why you wouldn’t be a believer in Celestia.


---

*Thanks for reading! If you want to get notified about future posts or give any input/feedback, [subscribe](https://mirror.xyz/knarb.eth) and follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_knarb). Or don’t. It’s up to you.*

*This article was first published on 24 January 2022 in Substack. Minor edits were made in formatting, descriptions based on the updated Celestia website and any mentions of “Web3” were replaced because I don’t like that term. Thank you and goodbye.*

title: Living in the present is beautiful
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wBqFm8gQ-2VU8J2eIKTcI.png?height=1300&width=1300)

Today I met my art teacher by chance. We ate early dinner at the restaurant.

He, the restaurant owner and I had a lot of talk.

One of the topic we had was the owner’s son.

Thinking about the future is ambitious,

but living in the present is beautiful.

title: 一些币圈的感悟
body:
**1.**2022.6.30

在币圈，基本上都是资本来推动的，不要过分迷恋技术，就像sol链，真正玩的都知道，卡不是一次两次了，十几次都有了，还能暂停，市值还不是前十。熊市也算好事情，洗的越多，飞得越高。毕竟一般来讲，瘦子跑的都比胖子快，熊市就是一个瘦身减肥的过程。

但是要注意你们的持仓成本，均价。不然牛市，很多人还回本不了。 比如你持仓的一个币，跌了十倍。人家抄底的涨了5倍，算牛了吧，对你而已还得涨1倍才能回本呢。然后等你回本，底部买的，都赚十倍了。

刻舟求剑来讲，很多人对牛市的定义，其实是突破历史新高。当然目前这个大环境，币圈怎么独善其身。给你讲新高的，真的是画饼。 我现在的想法就是，能反弹上2.9--5.2 这个区间来回就不错了，再远不敢想。

比特币一涨，币圈体量就暴涨，以前市值小，所以才有 百倍 千倍，体量大了，就很难了。 这就是为啥，很多山寨，到市值前十 基本上潜力就没的原因。 这可以给很多人爱持仓山寨一个梦想，就是 市值前十，基本上可以清仓了，因为往上，亏钱几率 比赚钱几率大太多了。

那些靠交易的人，当然有很多鄙视 看不起囤币党。 但是大家都是普通人，有啥办法？ 谁不想靠做交易赚钱？ 现在熊市，行情差了，做交易更难 那怎么 选几个。未来有潜力，能起飞的，山寨，是普通韭菜应该考虑的。 还有就是，赚钱了，该套现还是要得，买车买房，没得话是必须的。

有车有房，再搞点现金也是必须的 剩下，可以长持。 能长持的目标，建议还是起码上了币安吧。

**2.**2022.7.30

**讲一讲我的投资经历吧，共勉**

在玩币圈前 ，玩过股票和基金， 2020年8月开始 ，当时手里有一些钱， 准备进行投资 ，之前做过的唯一投资就是余额宝 。哈哈 ，为什么没进入币圈呢？但现在为什么又在币圈呢？请继续看！

一直未进入币圈的原因， 可以说一直是自己在敬而远之，国家也在宣传，是资金盘行为。作为从小受到社会主义教育 小学到大学的我  当然跟着我D的思想走 不过我有一个从小玩到大的朋友 2018年搞挖矿场地托管 当时赶上熊市 大概坚持了 8个月就倒闭了  2019年他在成都自己面试 去了一家叫A网交易所做客户经理  就前几个月 被端了那个A网交易所 我们关系非常要好 经常见面   他在2019年的时候 我们一起吃饭喝酒的桌子上 给我提过一嘴 兄弟 有闲钱可以自己买点比特币 放在那里 后面绝对会涨价   当时我不以为然  至此2019年到2021年 从来未再给我提过币圈的任何事情  一直到2021年5月自己进入圈子过后 才明白 不懂的人 你给他说再多都没用  我以前就是这样的一个人 相信90%以上的人 都是和我曾经一样的想法  经历过几件事情后 我改变了自己的看法 下面我开始讲讲我自己 不太丰富 但是绝对和大多数韭菜一样的经历

第一次投资： 2020年8月 在主动学习下 开始用支付宝购买股票类基金  投入56万CNY 2021年2月浮盈12万CNY   拿到21年6月 因购房需要资金 基金全抛了 浮亏-8000CNY  此次亏损本金较少  只是结果实在不太好受 

第二次投资：美股雾芯科技（RLX） 就是人均一支的悦刻电子烟母公司 因本人是一位老烟民 在悦刻上线就有购买  这之前还抽过 大烟雾DIY电子烟 IQOS 等等  受太多股票价值的洗脑 以及电子烟的利润非常高 悦刻更是电子烟的龙头   所以在雾芯科技 2021年3月上市的时候 就持续购买 不断补仓 直到21年12月 总计买入44500美金 现价值7000美金 准备反弹到9000美金左右 割肉了 因为感觉等它反弹 太难 不如割肉 把资金投入币圈 等下一个牛市 一定能回来 而且自己也不愿意再复投 拉低成本   所以准备浮亏-80% 进行卖出  此次为本人投资史上最大单笔亏损 净亏损-35500美金 都说股票稳 有监管  但是玩股票 我也经历过单日跌幅-48%  此股最高35元1股 IPO发行价12美元  最低1.16美元1股 截止2022年7月30日价格1.62美元   所以资本市场都一样 币圈 股圈 都是一样的 

第三次投资：2021年5月 也是在一个朋友的闲聊下 知道了以太坊挖矿 核算了 当时是8个月回本  所以第二天就开始买入显卡进行挖矿 当时一张1660s 3600CNY  一张3060 7000CNY 总计投入了30万 进行挖矿投资  一直挖到2022年1月份 这批机器已经回本 赚的是这一套机器的钱 但是当时 机器已经不值得30万了 大概当时出手价值15万左右  想着本已经回了 就没卖了 当时月开始进行了 收售矿机倒卖 一直倒卖到4月底  赚了大概10万CNY  自己在4月的时候又加了5台1660S 10台3060 10台30HX 增投了大概53W 加上之前的机器 在4月已经只值10万左右 一共现在机器投入了63W 10个G的以太坊算力  每月电费是1.7W 产出是每月4个ETH左右    

第四次投资：2022年5月买入了LUNA 后面大家都知道了 Luna暴雷 几天归零 亏损-14000U 

在挖矿期间 算是真正的进入了矿圈 币圈 见过形形色色的人 记忆最深刻 有一个哥们来买机器1660S 给了1个ETH 当时ETH 价格3000U 他是自己以前买的 买入价200U 这或许就是币圈的魅力吧  在挖矿后 开了币安等交易所的账户 和大多数人一样 玩了一段时间合约 亏损大概5000U后 就没玩了 一直到现在 也没再玩过合约 知道自己不是做短线交易的料 所以按照自己的策略 以后只进行现货投资 并长期持有到下一个牛市 生活资金准备到了2026年 准备总投入100万CNY的现货 以及准备一直挖不卖出的矿机 63万 加上电费什么的 总投资在183W 目标是在下一个牛市 有6倍的涨幅 到1000W抛掉所有币

在三四五线城市 有1000万已经足够生活了 赚钱不易 所以到了1000万的时候 我会进行全部套现  套现后 20%拿去还银行的贷款（房贷和抵押贷）  20%的资金 继续留在币圈 等熊市进行现货买入 平时就进行一些稳定的DEFI  35%的资金拿去银行存定期 利息已经够平时的开支   10%进行实业的一些投资  15%拿来回报下自己 换辆车 

**知之非难，行之不易**

经历过这么多的失败投资 总结下吧

1、大家要学会保存利润 该卖就卖 不赚最后的钱 只要利润在手 等回调 有大把机会上车   本金才是你的生存之道  以前的想法 只知道做多 看多 还不理解做空的人   其实多空都一样 涨多了跌 跌多了涨 涨的时候做好止盈 跌下来的时候 才有更多的资金进去抄底  笨人就该学习囤现货

2、不看好 觉得这个币垃圾  早点出售走人 

看好就得加仓，我5月ETC跌倒24 进行了一波2层底仓 后续跌倒16.8 补了一波2层仓位 看好不怕 定投完事 到今天 成本拉到19.33了 已经把本金卖出 利润有200个ETC 没卖 还继续现货持有 

如果真要起飞  还得靠要抓住熊市到牛市这个区间  从囤币拿个几倍 十几倍的 来实现财富上的跃进 
  
 我自己的囤币仓位 价格我有自己的策略 币种的话 建仓50%BTC 这是不败的基础 30%ETH 15%ETC 5%DOGE 这4个老牌的币 经历过几个牛熊 跌了不怕加仓 只要成本下去 反弹就起飞赚钱 本来想把ETC换成BNB 后面放弃了 不是很喜欢交易所的币 币安链也没有经历过时间的考验 起飞太快 而且和币安交易所CZ绑定太深  如果CZ出什么问题 BNB估计得大跌 这也是他的隐患 

选什么币 仁者见仁 智者见智 没有谁对谁错 但是请记住 80%的仓位一定要是BTC和ETH 这样至少不会亏损 一定要记着这点

当然多数山寨 加仓只会一直归0 所以找个优质的也很重要 比如uni这种 好歹是个以太链dex龙头 一定要记住 找山寨也要找龙头

title: FTC staff reportedly recommended against suing Meta
body:
Federal Trade Commission head Lina Khan overruled staff advice to intervene in a Meta virtual reality studio acquisition, *[Bloomberg](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-07-29/ftc-s-khan-overruled-staff-to-sue-meta-over-virtual-reality-deal)*[ reports](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-07-29/ftc-s-khan-overruled-staff-to-sue-meta-over-virtual-reality-deal). Sources reportedly told *Bloomberg* that staff had been “recommending against” suing to block Meta’s acquisition of Within, which makes the popular VR fitness app Supernatural*.* [The FTC voted 3 to 2 in favor](https://www.theverge.com/2022/7/27/23281033/ftc-meta-within-complaint-block-acquisition-vr-fitness-beat-saber) of the suit earlier this week, splitting respectively along Democratic and Republican party lines.

*Bloomberg’s* article doesn’t detail the substance of the disagreement over Meta’s Supernatural acquisition, although it does note that “each of the commissioners had the opportunity to test out Meta’s Oculus product, Within’s Supernatural, and Meta’s *Beat Saber*.” But the report would emphasize that Khan is making an unusually aggressive push to limit the power of companies like Meta, particularly compared to earlier interventions against major tech players. In 2013, for instance, the FTC [overruled input from staff](https://www.wsj.com/articles/inside-the-u-s-antitrust-probe-of-google-1426793274) who recommended bringing an antitrust suit against Google, ending the investigation despite concerns about its business practices.

The FTC’s latest suit targets the specific category of VR fitness apps. But a key claim is that buying Within has a larger purpose for Meta: “building, and ultimately controlling, a VR ‘metaverse.’” It asserts that by buying the fitness studio, Meta is removing competition that could spur it to keep improving its own software offerings, including the fitness-adjacent rhythm game *Beat Saber. “*As early as 2015, Mr. Zuckerberg instructed key Facebook executives that his vision for ‘the next wave of computing’ was control of apps and the platform on which those apps were distributed,” it says. “A key part of this strategy was for his company to be ‘completely ubiquitous in killer apps.’”
