title: 合约交了13u的学费，我懂得了Mind Meets Grind
body:
最近入门web3，抱着《学以致用，用以促学》的心态炒起了币。一周过去了，第一笔学费13u已经爆仓清算，虽然没几个钱，但这个过程中悟了很多，在此记录一下心路历程。

### TIMELINE

* 7.22充了100CNY，买了bnb，价格在$23x，持有四天至7.26见不见起色便划转了开始玩合约。然而截止今日7.30bnb已经$29x……
* 一开始入场只知道做多做空，对杠杆、仓这些概念都比较模糊。但保持了一个盈利状态一直到7.28，没记错是17u，当时扬言到20u就正式加本金入场。
* 7.29，噩梦的开始。午睡前开了etc多到150%差不多27u，贪x1，感觉稳了就只卖了四分之一睡觉去了。醒了看还在较高位，贪x2，就又只卖了四分之一。后来开始本金位置横盘，还不跑，还在贪x3，持续到晚上出门散步，路上迎来了第一次强平。多亏白天卖的小仓，现在是一个不盈不亏的状态。
* 散完步回家《不服气》又开了eth、etc两个空单，一开始小盈一两u，但总想着一口气吃成个胖子到20u好入场，贪x4，然后就瀑布了，etc再次强平，平仓位置还跟上次一样。看走势不好eth就止损了，手上只剩5u，接着自暴自弃直接1700位置全仓开多eth睡觉了。
* 7.30早起，eth1760，贪x5，没卖，等到跌到1720看没劲了才卖，小盈一点，7u了。气不过，跑去开了天花板op空单，后果就是迎来了第一次爆仓清算。

### REVIEW

* 好的方面看，吃一堑长一智，多少钱都是一样的，做好反思复盘，小成本爆仓并不亏（安慰）。
* 不要贪，不要贪，不要贪，不要贪，不要贪。见好就收，总比亏了好。不积跬步无以至千里。
* 谨慎开单，没有说法不强开单。
* 不要上头，亏了不要想着第一时间赚回来。
* 不要频繁做单，整日盯盘，觉都睡不好，放松。
* 开单后难以集中注意力学习，假期情有可原，后面开学这种状态是要出问题的。自己心态还不好，患得患失，只做的了短线，所以承接上面几点，少在合约上下功夫，不如囤b。这一周也见识了eth从$13xx到$17xx，bnb从$23x到$29x，真比合约舒服多了。

总的来说，不论盈亏，看行情的同时，也算学习了很多金融经济知识，对我一个经济小白来说也是好的。今天周六加明天周日休息，管住手，下周一8.1，100u入场，愿吸取教训，知行合一，不做韭菜。

title: 项目经验复盘-X2Y2
body:
复盘下今年首个深度参与的项目—X2Y2。从实际操盘角度来说，其实这次历时一个月左右，总收益60%+，在币圈真不算什么。中间有好几次可以让利益更大化的时间点都没有把握住。但对自己来说，浸淫币圈这么久，从来不炒币，严格遵守无风险搬砖套利守则，今年是跨出去的第一步，意义非凡。今年严格来说才算正式进入币圈，虽然已是熊市。个人对炒币的认知实在是太渺小了，所以这个项目的收益已经是超预期了。搬砖收益是小确幸，炒币收益就是赌徒了，确实容易上头，克制，克制。下面正式开始。

一、项目背景

项目背景其实很简单（以下简称xy，一直觉得打字太麻烦了），都知道NFT界目前为止opensea是绝对的龙头，交易量占绝对优势，所以有一堆陈胜吴广们想着取而代之。去年为了op发不发币，搞出了许多dao和空投，让我莫名的喝了几道汤。因为认知不足，错过了春节前的LooksRareNFT，一直在关注，但是没敢踏出那一步，事实证明极为可惜。既然错过了，就向前看了。Xy的初衷也是为了搭建更好的NFT交易平台，解决op平台的痛点，项目在上线前其实陆续也吹风了挺久了。关于项目的详细介绍，很多大v写了很多帖子，很细致。就不赘述了。Xy是looks之后第二个较热的NFT平台项目，所以整个玩法及引流的性质是极为相似的。但是他同时并用了几个引流方法：空投、xy单币质押、NFT挂单奖励。而且个个做法劲爆，这也为后来的一系列结果埋下了伏笔。

二、项目初期

按时间进度来说吧，首先是项目正式上线之前，项目方针对所有的opensea用户开启了巨大的空投。前期币价没公开，对空投量我其实没有直观的感觉，但是在币价和uniswap池子出来以后，就发现，空投量真的是巨大了。每个领到的，砸盘基本就是1千刀。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jcv82AjiMpmuBPIXKXtHV.png?height=438&width=865)

在第一波空投之后，币价开始开放买卖以及上抹茶等交易所。大概币价放开交易几天后，\*\*开始了最核心劲爆的引流模式-单币staking。\*\*为啥劲爆，因为3.16早上6：00挖矿开启，一早上买入xy后，质押收益达到每分钟2-3个点左右。收益爆炸了，初期年化170000%+，可能是我defi收益这些年来参与过的最高的矿了。即便当天结束，年化！年化！年化！收益仍有超过10000%+（日化30%+），持续到今天，仍有年化1000%+。论apy来说，绝对能够导入许多流量。毕竟这个收益可是在erc链普遍apy不超过5%的情况下。（looks当时已降至稳定在190%左右、sos在100%左右，其他基本忽略）。所以当天清晨6点半，币价1.7左右的时候，果断梭了进去，开始体验美妙的秒级百分比挖矿收益。但是其实，潜在的风险是存在的，看似美好的东西，一定是有风险的，比如当天上午币价从1.7跌到了近1.2。看似日化很高，如果当天持续这个币价，当天本金就暴跌40-50%。实际净收益是亏的\~

导致币价上午暴跌的原因，就是大量空投的因素。空投太多了，即使币价跌到1u，随便砸盘还可以收益一两千，空投用户根本不会计成本，无脑砸就行了。所以清晨挖矿是带有炒币性质的，当时上午心很凉，想第一次炒币就这么交学费了。庆幸的是，援军来了\~

项目方也意识到了这个问题，如果不及时干预，币价直接崩溃，项目当天就黄了。所以虽然没有官宣，但是事实上暂时停止了空投。币价随即开始了一轮反弹，不擅炒币的我没有去抄底，否则，最高在第二天摸了4u，上下差价接近2.5倍。不管怎么样，停止空投让我回了本，我在1.9出了本金。剩下的全力挖矿。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hBaZPpCt3z5xp8bki8cci.png?height=920&width=1486)

三、插曲—xy大佬

说到这里，插播一条好玩的。就在挖矿的第二天，许多人闻风而来，为什么陆陆续续到第二天包括一些大v。因为xy的官网上，可以挖矿，但是不显示apy，只能靠实测\~所以信息流传递速度有一到两天时间。同时，第二天来了现在xy挖矿的持仓第一大佬，他买xy的本金都是从looks砸盘转移过来的。大佬一共分了四次买xy，在大佬第一次买xy的时候，用dexscreener成功监测到了大单，并且在他第二次买的时候判断出他会把所有的持仓全部换成xy，在这时我的一个兄弟果断在他第三次买前的间隙插缝买入，待大佬子弹全部梭完，直接砸盘套现，历时不超过半小时，收益超过5%，堪称手动三明治的经典。

大佬那天买的均价差不多在3.3-3.5，至今仍在全仓挖矿，丝毫未动，嗯，大佬就是淡定。

四、项目第二阶段

基本在那个时间段，许多大v都开始喊单及加入了。还有大v开始写宣传、看好的介绍材料。写的东西确实挺好，但是后面的东西，我不懂，也不评论。就在这样的环境下，开启了第二阶段\~第二阶段就是，作为NFT平台，xy提出了与looks挖矿截然不同的玩法，既然looks是nft交易挖矿有刷量的嫌疑。那我们就换一个，nft挂单就有奖励，而且你不用从op撤单，允许双挂。挂单就奖xy\~而且不区分nft价值。听完第一反应是。。。ENS\~我速度把心仪已久的喜欢的域名买了下来。反正花的钱挂单可以回本\~这个阶段开启后，挂单奖励每天的总奖励币量虽然只有staking的一半，但是这种模式带来了另一个问题，一是进一步加大了挖矿收益的抛压，二是挂单都是双挂，前期运营不足，很多nft价格较低仍然在op成交。其实根本不能转换为实际成交量，对平台的基本面无实质影响，逻辑本身个人就觉得有问题。

虽然这个模式最后因为项目方修改了不同nft的奖励系数，对我而言只持续了两三天奖励左右，聊胜于无，况且喜欢的域名本来我也要买。但是让我这种传统圈出身的人对项目产生了信任动摇，虽然是为了项目长久，但是任意修改既定规则（包括前期暂停空投），都反映了项目方的考虑不周以及应对相对迟缓。

五、xy下跌阶段

就这样，在空投、单币挖矿、挂单挖矿三重压力下，币价从4刀开始掉头急下，开启了持续下跌模式，在这个阶段中间，第一家，也是唯一的一家抹茶xy合约开启了。从这个时间点开始，无风险套保开始了。意味着你可以几乎零成本或者微成本将本金及前期挖矿利润锁定，稳定的挖年化5000%+的矿，美滋滋\~计划都很好结果实操出了个幺蛾子，实在没想到xy套保太火爆了，一不留神，合约数量限制没开到顶抹茶竟然关闭了合约限额且一点征兆都没有，那你还开什么合约！这样导致实际套保数量小于计划套保数量，没有完成套保完全体。也正是因为这批风险敞口，导致了利润缩水很多，真是极其心酸！

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HLIv1AENxQHFtDn8NdNqw.png?height=420&width=1180)

更搞笑的是，上帝和我又开了一次玩笑，在xy暴跌的途中有一天中午，抹茶悄悄的又打开了一些限额。结果\~我碰巧在外吃饭，无法完成设置，就一个多小时，回来以后，又没了！至今再没有交易所上过合约，抹茶再没开放过限制！！！就这样损失了一批利润，虽然后续抹茶开了3S对冲杠杆，在3s上赚了不少，但是轻松程度和套保挖矿完全不可比。况且，3S只能搬砖套利，无法用来完成完美套保，所以只能怪自己太松懈，错过一个亿。其实，对项目方来说，没开合约也许是好事，因为如果合约没关，也许会吸引更多套保，可能塌的更快。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/odwdJmrwFqcZxTWLIlO7D.png?height=891&width=1450)

就这样，在接下去的时间里，许多人为了看上去极高的apy不断抄底，不断套牢。xy的discord人声鼎沸，不断吐槽，不断给项目方提建议，但是一直没有实质性动作。最终，第一次跌到了ilo价格附近0.25u。也在那天，项目方终于发了通告，大幅修改nft挂单奖励规则。币价应声暴涨，然而0.25翻倍又是多少呢？

其实纵观群内提的建议，都是皮毛，什么界面优化啊、批量挂单啊。当然也有人直击矛盾，停止空投啊、修改nft规则啊。最终项目方选择了修改空投规则、修改挂单奖励规则。但是最根本的问题，巨大的staking收益没有人敢触碰，没有人敢修改。吵着制裁羊毛党，但是真的敢制裁吗？空投在项目方后续修改过空投规则后，其实已经趋近平缓，抛压不大了。nft奖励量也只是staking的一半。所以其实并没有动到根源，也不敢动根源—单币质押。到底有多少人不是为了来撸这个实质上的矿币呢？erc链，这么高的挖矿收益，只要不跑路。xy社区里一直有人在说，xy一直在做事，但是相比looks现在实际成交的稳步增长，xy的基本面到目前也一直没有好起来，官方一直要推出的反叛军NFT也一直没有进展。所以除了矿币属性，他还有什么呢？

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VO6SfoZCuV1euajGjT3Tj.png?height=858&width=1355)

六、项目满月

项目至今正好一个月了，正处于满月收益减半期。也正因如此，可以预料到会有一大批未套保的人选择获利（也许是认亏）离场，所以在一周前我提前清掉了大量未套保的风险敞口。事实证明，在前几天，确实引发了大量抛盘提前偷跑，导致币价瞬间砸破0.25，基本符合预期，毕竟熙熙攘攘皆为利来。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZBu5rEIAyJ2ygzHJy4IMV.png?height=935&width=1484)

至此，这个项目对我来说已经接近尾声，毕竟头汤已经结束了，我也基本套现离场，只剩无风险套保的量了。对他的评价可以归纳为一句“莫笑他人不长久，静下心来自思量”，产品开发是不能浮躁的，而这个项目给我最大的感觉就是浮躁和茫然、局促。后续如何我也会继续关注，也希望他能够发展起来。

今年的第二个和第三个梭哈项目是APEX和RND，一个已经有结果了。另一个等上线看吧。

最后，对我的分享有兴趣的可以来我推特点个关注和转发，然后来我的discord聊聊天。我发布干货分享体会，纯粹是为个人在币圈留点念想。鼓励技术探讨，欢迎项目挖掘，一起凭本事赚钱。

我的推特号：stephonesun

body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ca5lINwsh9IPst2RpSrIm.png?height=787&width=1400)

**[Harvest Moon](https://moonbeam.network/blog/harvest-moon/)**是一项旨在激发 DeFi 活动的活动，希望 Web3 生态系统中的不同链能够联合起来，在 Moonbeam 网络上构建 DeFi 的未来。Moonbeam 独特的跨链连接智能合约将成为将所有这些链结合在一起的驱动力。

Moonbeam 基金会表示，它已分配高达**1.5% 的 GLMR 创世供应**，以资助 ​​Harvest Moon 活动的基于赠款的流动性计划。第一波**Harvest Moon**将鼓励参与应用程序（Lido、Curve、StellaSwap 和 Moonwell）的活动。随着下一波的部署，**Harvest Moon**将扩展以允许用户利用 Moonbeam 独特的 DeFi 功能。

**Harvest Moon**将运行大约三到四个月，并将专注于吸引新用户并构建实现多链互联智能合约愿景所需的核心 DeFi 原语。**分配给Harvest Moon**的代币数量和活动的长度可能会发生变化。

**Ultimate Harvest Moon**活动将于**2022 年 7 月 28 日 14:00（UTC）开始**，并在 Project Galaxy 上运行**三周**，作为用户与 Harvest Moon 活动中的项目互动以赢得 NFT 的一种方式。

在此处查看活动链接：[https ://galaxy.eco/Moonbeam/campaign/GCcg1Ut2hD](https://galaxy.eco/Moonbeam/campaign/GCcg1Ut2hD)

**Ultimate Harvest Moon Campaign**的所有 NFT均由位于亚洲的 Web3 NFT 工作室 PaperPlane 设计。PaperPlane 融合了迷幻幻想和超现实主义，他们说这是受到一位有影响力的漫画家让·吉罗（以笔名“莫比乌斯”而闻名）的启发。

在**Ultimate Harvest Moon Campaign 期间**，Substrate 层索引数据由[Web3Go](https://web3go.xyz/#/home/main)提供，Web3Go是一个从 Polkadot 生态系统开始的一体化开放数据分析和服务平台。智能合约层凭证使用[The Graph](https://thegraph.com/en/)进行索引。

关于如何参与**The Harvest Moon Campaign**很简单：

1. 符合条件的地址需要完成 6 个 Moonbeam 生态系统项目（Moonbeam App、Nomad、Moonwell、StellaSwap、Lido Finance 和 Curve Finance）提供的任务。
2. 每完成一项任务，都将获得一个为NFT 设计工作室[Paperplan](https://mobile.twitter.com/ppd_workshop) e 设计的 NFT 拼图。
3. 在收集完活动中所有（6）个 NFT 后，每个符合条件的地址将有机会合成一个终极“Harvest Moon”NFT，传达跨链未来愿景。每个符合条件的地址都可以在**2022 年 8 月 23 日**申领此 NFT 。所有 (6) 个 NFT 拼图持有者的快照将于**2022 年 8 月 18 日 14:00 (UTC)**拍摄。
4. 本次活动中铸造的所有 NFT 都将在 Moonbeam Network 区块链上。

    

   开始进入正题：终极收获月球战役的 6 项任务

   # 终极丰收之月 | 任务1：转移

   **关于月光**

   Moonbeam 是一个用于跨链连接应用程序的智能合约平台，它结合了以太坊、Cosmos、Polkadot 及其他领域的功能。

   **门户网站**

   <https://apps.moonbeam.network/moonbeam>

   **任务描述**

   将 DOT 从 Polkadot 转移到 Moonbeam

   注意：凭证将在活动期间每 24 小时更新一次。

   **[教程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZZEsBKmIn4)**在这里。

   [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZZEsBKmIn4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZZEsBKmIn4)

   # 终极丰收之月 | 任务2：桥梁

   **项目介绍**

   Nomad 是一种跨链通信标准，可以在链之间实现廉价且安全的代币和数据传输。

   **门户网站**

   游牧：[https ://app.nomad.xyz/](https://app.nomad.xyz/)

   **任务描述**

   [使用Nomad](https://app.nomad.xyz/)将 ETH、BTC 或 USDC 从以太坊发送到 Moonbeam Network 。

   **[教程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jolvKUgZkBs)**在这里。

   [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jolvKUgZkBs](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jolvKUgZkBs)

   # 终极丰收之月 | 任务3：交换

   **项目介绍**

   StellaSwap 是 Moonbeam 上的 DEX，它提供了通往 DeFi 世界的集成网关。用户可以在一个统一的平台上进行兑换、赚取、收益农场、桥接代币、探索新项目和从事 NFT 交易。

   **门户网站**

   <https://app.stellaswap.com/zh-CN/exchange/swap>

body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ca5lINwsh9IPst2RpSrIm.png?height=787&width=1400)

**[Harvest Moon](https://moonbeam.network/blog/harvest-moon/)**是一项旨在激发 DeFi 活动的活动，希望 Web3 生态系统中的不同链能够联合起来，在 Moonbeam 网络上构建 DeFi 的未来。Moonbeam 独特的跨链连接智能合约将成为将所有这些链结合在一起的驱动力。

Moonbeam 基金会表示，它已分配高达**1.5% 的 GLMR 创世供应**，以资助 ​​Harvest Moon 活动的基于赠款的流动性计划。第一波**Harvest Moon**将鼓励参与应用程序（Lido、Curve、StellaSwap 和 Moonwell）的活动。随着下一波的部署，**Harvest Moon**将扩展以允许用户利用 Moonbeam 独特的 DeFi 功能。

**Harvest Moon**将运行大约三到四个月，并将专注于吸引新用户并构建实现多链互联智能合约愿景所需的核心 DeFi 原语。**分配给Harvest Moon**的代币数量和活动的长度可能会发生变化。

**Ultimate Harvest Moon**活动将于**2022 年 7 月 28 日 14:00（UTC）开始**，并在 Project Galaxy 上运行**三周**，作为用户与 Harvest Moon 活动中的项目互动以赢得 NFT 的一种方式。

在此处查看活动链接：[https ://galaxy.eco/Moonbeam/campaign/GCcg1Ut2hD](https://galaxy.eco/Moonbeam/campaign/GCcg1Ut2hD)

4. 本次活动中铸造的所有 NFT 都将在 Moonbeam Network 区块链上。

title: 合约交了13u的学费，我懂得了Mind Meets Grind
body:
最近入门web3，抱着《学以致用，用以促学》的心态炒起了币。一周过去了，第一笔学费13u已经爆仓清算，虽然没几个钱，但这个过程中悟了很多，在此记录一下心路历程。

### TIMELINE

* 7.22充了100CNY，买了bnb，价格在$23x，持有四天至7.26见不见起色便划转了开始玩合约。然而截止今日7.30bnb已经$29x……
* 一开始入场只知道做多做空，对杠杆、仓这些概念都比较模糊。但保持了一个盈利状态一直到7.28，没记错是17u，当时扬言到20u就正式加本金入场。
* 7.29，噩梦的开始。午睡前开了etc多到150%差不多27u，贪x1，感觉稳了就只卖了四分之一睡觉去了。醒了看还在较高位，贪x2，就又只卖了四分之一。后来开始本金位置横盘，还不跑，还在贪x3，持续到晚上出门散步，路上迎来了第一次强平。多亏白天卖的小仓，现在是一个不盈不亏的状态。
* 散完步回家《不服气》又开了eth、etc两个空单，一开始小盈一两u，但总想着一口气吃成个胖子到20u好入场，贪x4，然后就瀑布了，etc再次强平，平仓位置还跟上次一样。看走势不好eth就止损了，手上只剩5u，接着自暴自弃直接1700位置全仓开多eth睡觉了。
* 7.30早起，eth1760，贪x5，没卖，等到跌到1720看没劲了才卖，小盈一点，7u了。气不过，跑去开了天花板op空单，后果就是迎来了第一次爆仓清算。

### REVIEW

* 好的方面看，吃一堑长一智，多少钱都是一样的，做好反思复盘，小成本爆仓并不亏（安慰）。
* 不要贪，不要贪，不要贪，不要贪，不要贪。见好就收，总比亏了好。不积跬步无以至千里。
* 谨慎开单，没有说法不强开单。
* 不要上头，亏了不要想着第一时间赚回来。
* 不要频繁做单，整日盯盘，觉都睡不好，放松。
* 开单后难以集中注意力学习，假期情有可原，后面开学这种状态是要出问题的。自己心态还不好，患得患失，只做的了短线，所以承接上面几点，少在合约上下功夫，不如囤b。这一周也见识了eth从$13xx到$17xx，bnb从$23x到$29x，真比合约舒服多了。

总的来说，不论盈亏，看行情的同时，也算学习了很多金融经济知识，对我一个经济小白来说也是好的。今天周六加明天周日休息，管住手，下周一8.1，老规矩100CNY入场，到20u加本金至100u，愿吸取教训，知行合一，不做韭菜。

title: 一文撸完Paradigm投资项目
body:
越到熊市，就越要寻找优质项目，哪怕变现时间很长，也值得等待，毕竟熊市期间我们可以打、也愿意打持久战，用时间兑换金钱。

这一次笔者带给大家的是Paradigm投资的空投指南和全项目介绍。Paradigm和a16z同属币圈顶流投资公司，相比后者，其更专注于区块链行业，投资的很多项目也还没发币，有的可能还需要等待很久，正适合熊市埋伏；还有不少近期准备发币的项目我们之前已经有所介绍，就不再多说了。

长话短说，我们马上进入空投项目的探寻。

## 一、潜在空投项目

## 佐拉

zora也是一个nft交易平台，目前有一个nft可以mint，同时也是兔子洞任务之一，未来持有zorb可能会有福利，同时也要记得参加dis，里面经常会有各种持有zorb才有福利活动，比如抽奖。

### 奥普恩

期权交易所，挺好的项目，就是交互有难度，赌狗们小心别把自己搞爆仓了

建议做多以后立即在close里面平掉

![期权有风险，不要上头](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FlKkuVueK7FMCvQR22SsIT.png&w=828&q=90)

期权有风险，不要上头

### 你好

目前早期阶段，除了肝discord没什么可做的 至少要肝到8级才能参与更多活动

### 分数

可以把NFT碎片化销售，降低进入的门槛，挺有意思的

空投建议：

1\.购买碎片化的NFT，注意不要买到相对opensea溢价太高的

2\.把自己的NFT粉碎，然后弄几个钱包买回来

3\.交互后去dis频道绑定自己钱包，注意公告参加AMA活动，多与项目方互动

### zkmoney

之前介绍过，适当交互几次即可，从官方的消息来看，发空投还遥遥无期

## 模糊

一个nft交易所，还未上线和发币， 之前我的推特有推荐过加入waitlist，19日已经关闭 想撸的玩家可以关注推特，等待下一个阶段

### 吉特币

大名鼎鼎的币圈捐款项目应该人尽皆知了吧

实质上有点像抽奖吧，捐了也不一定有空投，但是opt发币就会参考你是否参与过该项目。

所以建议所有人都去参与2次，一次在L1上，一次在zkSync 的L2上，具体数额自己决定，多了也不一定有回报

第14期6月8日开始，如果愿意等，晚一点再参加也可以。

### 分形

相比opensea，fractal是专注游戏领域的nft交易，并为此设计了十分酷炫和个性化的交易界面

目前发售有自己专属的NFT，拥有可获得相应的权益，是否会根据持有的NFT还不好说，我自己买了个便宜的，DYOR。

![首页截图](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FAyTWP77LTst3JXQUeGKYs.png&w=3840&q=90)

首页截图

### Praxis

这是一个致力于构建基于web3新型社会的项目，目前还在早期阶段，也还没有发币

**虽然距离上线主网还有很长时间，但未来可能会是一个大毛**

这种加入方式比较复杂，需要去主页提交申请并加入dis，在dis里完成各种任务

完成任务会获得积分，将来可能会兑换成相应的token

![任务示例](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FH7Z1hzVjr31GpkXIWPQ9F.png&w=1920&q=90)

任务示例

### Spacemesh

希望设计让所有电脑都能参与挖矿的项目革新区块链运作模式的项目

2020年就开始测试，目前还在测试网阶段，版本0.2，距离主网上线应该还有很长时间，是否能够成功也未可知

但是周期越长的项目奖励就回报可能就越丰厚

如果参与，建议买一个便宜的云服务器，做好长期运行一两年的打算

### BetDex

黄赌毒永远有市场，目前准备beta，可以加入等待名单，进入dic验证SOL钱包

### Argent钱包

尽量在支持argent的dapp上使用这个钱包即可

### Mad Realities

搞了Web3版真人秀节目《Proof of Love》，该节目以约会为主题。特定NFT（目前地板价0.78ETH）持有者可以进行直播互动并有权决定演员名单。目前看来也不太像要空投的样子。

### Magic

这是SOL链上最大的NFT交易市场，最近SOL上的NFT也很火，大量NFT都是从这里交易出去的。

![](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FIVUyB88XXa-1WhFef4htP.png&w=3840&q=90)

### Optimistic

介绍过很多期了，已经快照即将发币，不多说了

### Starkware

之前已经介绍过多次，不重复了

### 二、其他未发币项目概览

像之前的a16z项目介绍一样，我们除了撸空投外，还会顺带了解一下其他项目，对Paradigm有一个大概的了解。

### 基础设施

**Phantom**

一个SOL的钱包，目前还没有一线钱包发币的案例，正常使用就好

**0(1)labs**

0(1)labs是区块链技术开发公司，主攻零知识证明，最近很火的mina就是其产品

**Sky Mavis**

这个上期也介绍过了，同样被a16z投资的游戏工作室，没什么可撸的毛

**天网**

Skynet是基于Sia的云存储应用，没发币也不准备发币

**护手**

这是一个加密网络仿真测试平台，该公司开发了一个用于在DeFi生态系统中为区块链治理决策建模的系统。，面向商用，无毛

**闪光机器人**

目前还很早期，甚至dis讨论都很少，不适合撸毛

**火块**

区块链安全公司，主要保护商业公司的资产，无毛

**链分析**

面向商用的链上数据分析和安全公司

### NFT类

**皇家**

音乐NFT平台，上期已经介绍过了，a16z也投资过

**开演时间**

一个很酷的NFT社交平台，可以理解成web3版本的Instagram，创作了作品后还能以NFT的形式销售

**平行**

科幻风的NFT卡牌游戏，没毛

### 金融类

**城堡**

body:
[https://youtu.be/pBtyqnVp7xc](https://youtu.be/pBtyqnVp7xc)

………………………………………………

Sui：前Meta团队和顶尖机构MystenLabs创建的公链

投资机构：a16z, Redpoint, Coinbase Venture等

顶尖团队，顶尖融资，顶尖技术

………………………………………………

Sui所具备新公链脱颖而出的要素

* 高性能（类似的有EOS, SOL, NEAR等）
  1. 改变共识机制，牺牲去中心化（不可能三角：性能、去中心化、安全）

     Sui共识：拜占庭广播 + BFT共识（有验证节点，staking激励，本质是Pos）

     并行协议：常见公链按照时间状态处理交易，而sui能并行处理具有从属关系的交易，提高了吞吐量
  2. 构建新架构，使协议能并行运行交易

     编程语言：Rust和Move，可以使Sui不再依赖于EVM虚拟机和Solidity；同时Move支持更多数据结构，有利于开发者

     对于简单用例，比如转账，放弃共识，转而使用低延迟的原语处理，增加吞吐量
* 低gas费

  Sui的Gas费定价：基于节点报价

  举例：假设有100个节点，用户发起一笔交易，会得到100个报价，Gas费收取按照报价从低到高取2/3；2/3的数字有详细数学模型推算，其作用在于使定价比取中位数更方便，同时比取平均数更好，保证Sui上的gas费不会高得离谱

………………………………………………

Sui代币的用途

* 质押，获得Pos奖励
* 交付gas费的资产面额
* Sui生态系统的通用资产
* 治理代币

………………………………………………

Sui的存储基金：表明Sui未来不仅能处理数据，还会发展类似IPFS数据储存的功能；存储基金将用于构建Sui生态链上数据储存的经济模型，目前执行策略和技术细节尚无

………………………………………………

总结：

* 底层逻辑为Pos+一些独特的架构设计，常见于新公链
* 放弃solidity使用move进行研发，非技术开发者不好评判，只能以后看疗效
* 并行验证部分没太看懂，不清楚共识如何达成，是否会很中心化？
* 公链赛道的发展更看生态而不是技术，Sui将面临极大的竞争压力
* 顶尖机构已经入场，散户没有参与机会，只能等二级市场接盘

………………………………………………

Sui的存储基金：表明Sui未来不仅能处理数据，还会发展类似IPFS数据储存的功能；存储基金将用于构建Sui生态链上数据储存的经济模型，目前执行策略和技术细节尚无

………………………………………………

Aptos

前Meta团队创建的公链

投资机构：FTX venture, Jump Crypto等

与Sui的雷同之处：团队前身相同，编程语言都是Move

不同之处：Aptos的发展和生态构建进度更快，主网将于Q3上线，项目在Medium上有公布超过100个生态构建计划，包括NFT，Gamefi，存储等的激励计划，并且与多家公司有过沟通

………………………………………………

提升tps的方式：move编程语言 + Block-STM技术（具体原理笔者没听懂）

共识机制：Aptos BFT协议，作用是系统中只要有大于三分之二的节点正常，协议就能继续运作

Gas费优化：可以用Aptos以外的代币作gas费

………………………………………………

总结

* Aptos团队靠人脉和资源吸引了很多Builder，开发情况看上去比Sui更好（然而毕竟是项目方说的，实际怎么样不知道，用户应该在项目落地前始终保持怀疑）
* 说明文档偏代码导向，不如Sui清晰明了
* 没有代币经济模型
* EOS的教训：优秀的技术和叙事，最终落得始乱终弃龙头；机构高举高打的火热项目，筹码到散户手里却可能毫无表现，因此散户应该更关注未来生态，看上面的NFT、Gamefi、Defi等项目是否有盈利机会

title: 以太坊的介绍 堆金积玉 学习笔记
body:
[https://youtu.be/26kR2vUbbJo](https://youtu.be/26kR2vUbbJo)

………………………………………………

区块链的特点

去中心化：数据不在单一的数据库中，而是储存于多个分散的节点中，节点越多信息就越不容易被篡改

透明：项目代码开源，交易数据可查（注：与区块链保护隐私不矛盾，个人身份用密码学隐藏，例如交易数据中查不到某人转账多少比特币，只能查到某地址转账多少比特币）

不可篡改：通过在数字文档上加盖时间戳（证明数据在某个特定时间之前已经完整存在的）实现

………………………………………………

合约：书面或口头的共识，由法律保证强制执行

智能合约：数字化形式的合约，由计算机程序执行；由于代码自动运行，便不再需要依靠法律的强制力

执行智能合约的环境：以太坊虚拟机EVM，运行在每个以太坊节点中

以太坊节点记录的内容：交易信息+智能合约和应用程序的状态

………………………………………………

以太坊：下一代加密货币与去中心化应用平台

创始人：Vitalik Buterin

编程语言：Solidity，方便于编写智能合约

特点：开源项目，任何人都能在以太坊上创建和使用去中心化应用程序（Dapps），Dapps一旦上传到以太坊，将始终按照编好的程序运行，可用于控制数字资产

………………………………………………

Dapps与传统网站的区别

传统网站：前端→API→数据库，后端代码运行在中央服务器上

DApp的网站：前端→智能合约→区块链，后端代码运行在去中心化的P2P网络上

………………………………………………

Vitalik对Dapps的分类：

金融应用：使用户更好的管理钱和用钱去参与合约，比如金融产品及其衍生品，借贷等

半金融应用：将一些本身并非金融应用的服务与金融、支付用例结合起来，比如链游

非金融应用：例如在线投票和去中心化治理，不涉及财务层面

………………………………………………

以太币和比特币的区别

比特币Bitcoin：对法币失去信任的结果，可作为一般流通货币，比特币上限2100万，具有抗通胀属性，被比作crypto中的黄金

以太币Ether：作用是给以太坊的运作提供动力，激励人们在以太坊上维护数据，以太币没有数量上限，被比作crypto中的石油

………………………………………………

Gas费：在以太坊上执行操作，譬如发起交易，会消耗计算和存储资源，由此需要付Gas费给矿工

运作逻辑：用户支付的Gas费越高，就有更多节点优先处理操作，能够避免遇上区块拥堵（类似现实中出1元一般没有人送货，出100元就有很多人抢单）

作用：执行任何操作都需要支付gas费，防止有人白嫖从而浪费网络资源；即使交易失败，用户仍需为矿工已完成的工作支付gas费，防止恶意攻击网络

………………………………………………

Gas费的单位：Gwei（1 Gwei = 0.000000001 ETH）

计算公式（2021年8月伦敦升级后）：Gas Fee = ( Base + Priority ) \* Gas Limit

Base Fee由系统设定，这部分会被销毁掉，保证流通中的以太币不会只增无减

Priority Fee支付给矿工，用户可以自行设定，其高低会影响交易速度

Gas Limit指用户愿意为操作支付的Gas数量上限，一般钱包会自动设置，太少会导致交易失败；若实际消耗的数量少于Gas Limit，则没有消耗的Gas费会自动退还

Gas费估算查询 https://etherscan.io/gastracker

………………………………………………

Erc20：以太坊上的一种代币标准，允许开发者在以太坊上开发代币，规定了一系列标准，比如代币名称、代币总量、小数点位数等。创建Erc20代币必须遵守Erc20标准，如果不遵守，譬如想不给代币命名，或把代币总量设为无限大，那么便不能创建成功。

作用：使开发者能够高效可靠，低成本地开发专属自己项目的代币；使各种资产能用于不同的项目和平台；使各种代币之间的兑换与Dapps的支持更见方便

基于Erc20协议的常见代币：USDT, USDC, WBTC, DAI

………………………………………………

以太坊2.0

未完待续

title: Investment Principles
body:
How much do we really know as investors? Do we know the ins and outs of a diversified portfolio of say 80 stocks? I’ve recently read through the Nomad Investment Partnership letters and one of its management duo Nick Sleep believed there are just a few big things in life that are knowable and it was for that reason Nomad had just a few investments. If you believe the probabilities are in your favour that you have found an insightful business truth then you may be justified in having a concentrated portfolio of 10 businesses.

Steve Schwarzman in his book lessons in the pursuit of excellence thinks in a similar way to sleep noting that typically there are only two or three important factors that are important in every deal an investor should pay attention to, the rest is largely noise.

As a fundamental investor Sleep touched upon what has been a robust investment principle:

*“ The trick it seems to us, if one is to be a successful long term investor is to recognise the sources of enduring business success, get in early and own enough to make a difference.”*

This seems obvious but simply pursuing the sources of enduring business success could be contrarian in an investment community where there is a mass army of short term quantitative traders, technical approaches, macro forecasters and sentiment based market timers. Superior investment success requires doing something different and better than the herd and pre 2014 when Sleep ran Nomad - his long term, business focused strategy was superior to the crowd.

Thus as we look at crypto investments it might pay to ask the questions Sleep asked to his stocks while at Nomad:

What are the sources of crypto projects success? 
 Are they predictable and if so why are they not discounted in prices already?

One of Nomad’s valuable insights that Nick believed drove enduring success was the scale economies shared model that Amazon and Walmart used and which turned size -normally an anchor on business growth in to an asset. While many valuation heuristics would scale down growth in their DCF models this was the wrong way to value businesses who shared their scale benefits with customers through price give backs. Nomad realised that Amazon’s culture of price give backs was stable overtime and the source of great success. Culture however is harder to quantify and less easily screened for and thus went undervalued to a large part of the investment community.

So to sum what investment principles can we take away as long term fundamental value driven investors:

* Superior performance requires unconventional thinking and requires your approach to be different and better than the herd. If your analysis is wrong you run the risk of under performance.
* Digging down deep in to the root cause of enduring business success can be contrarian however obvious it seems and thus can lead to superior performance.
* Be obsessively customer focused rather than competitor focused.
* When you find an important business truth that is probably right it pays to outweigh your bet size.

A highly concentrated inactive portfolio or as Charlie Munger says sitting on your ass requires daily decisions not to sell. Sleep believes almost no one does this because it requires patience. A trait lacking in the investment profession.

Resources

https://igyfoundation.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Full_Collection_Nomad_Letters_.pdf

title: 比特币的介绍 得到卓克 学习笔记
body:
[https://youtu.be/gYz3-h26VUo](https://youtu.be/gYz3-h26VUo)

………………………………………………

比特币：不能篡改的账本，保存于每个网络节点中

工作原理举例：

原始信息：A给B转账1个比特币

1、原始信息经过sha256计算，获得原哈希

2、客户端生成公钥和私钥，私钥作用于原哈希，获得密哈希

3、广播原始信息+公钥+密哈希

………………………………………………

Sha256运算：任意长度的消息，通过该运算，都能获得一个唯一的256位的二进制数

算法好处：非常方便对比原始数据是否一致（原数据只要发生一点变化，加密后获得的哈希值就会完全不同）

抗碰撞性：原数据经加密后，再用加密数据倒推出原数据极其困难（Sha256算法具有抗碰撞性）

………………………………………………

对称加密：加密和解密通信双方使用相同的密钥（密钥泄露则通信被破解）

非对称加密法：加密和解密使用一对不同的密钥（公钥和私钥）

用公钥加密数据，只有对应的私钥才能解密；用私钥加密数据，只有对应的公钥才能解密

原理举例：

AB两人分别有自己的一对公钥和私钥，公钥对外公开，私钥只有自己知道

A要向B发送信息，A用B的公钥来加密信息，并广播加密后的信息

A告诉B：我广播了一条信息，是发给你的

B收到A加密后的信息，用自己的私钥解密，获得A发给自己的信息

其他人收到A加密后消息都无法解密，只有B能解密，因为B的私钥只有他自己知道

………………………………………………

签名：让别人知道这条信息是真的由我发布的

现实世界：手写签名（个人笔体不容易造假）

电子信息世界：私钥加密，公钥解密

逻辑：有一条加密的信息，可以用A的公钥解开，因此消息是用A的私钥加密的，而A的私钥只有他自己知道，因此这条消息一定是A发的

………………………………………………

验证交易信息（矿工的工作）

1、将原始信息做sha256运算，获得原哈希

2、将密哈希用公钥解密，获得解密哈希

3、若解密哈希=原哈希，则说明交易内容没有改动，交易内容由发起方签名确认

………………………………………………

区块：矿工将几千条验证过的交易信息按一定格式打包，得到的数据包

一致性问题：不同矿工打包的区块中内容不同，谁有资格把自己打包的区块放在主链的末尾

工作量证明（Proof of Work）：把打包好的区块整体看作字符串，在字符串末尾添加一个随机数，将结果做一次sha256运算，谁最先在运算结果中出现一个前72位都是0的二进制数，谁就能获得下个区块的记账权，并获得一些比特币作为奖励

比特币减半：矿工验证交易获得的奖励约每四年减半一次

挖矿难度：协议会根据全网算力调整挖矿难度，确保比特币固定每10-15分钟出块一次；挖矿难度升高，工作量证明中需要算出更多个0，降低时则相反

最长链原则：如果两个矿工同时出块，系统会等一段时间，哪个新区块所在的链更长，就记录哪个区块。其作用是维护区块链账本的唯一性，如果有黑客想篡改交易数据，那么他出块的速度必须比全网其他所有的矿工加起来还快，因为比特币只认可最长链

比特币的区块链结构：区块体和区块头，每个区块的区块体中记录着交易信息，区块头通过记录上个区块整体的sha256函数值，连接着上一个区块。一个个区块连在一起，形成区块链。

比特币的局限性：矿工为了完成工作量证明，达成最长链原则的共识，做了大量无意义的计算，消耗能量巨大，比特币挖矿的耗电量相当于一个中等规模的欧洲国家；吞吐量低，比特币每秒处理的交易次数为7-8次，而常见的支付平台每秒可处理至少百万次交易

title: 以太坊纽约获奖项目 vic会议纪要
body:
[https://youtu.be/BXACJdN7hNU](https://youtu.be/BXACJdN7hNU)

以太坊纽约获奖项目中，成果的整个研发是由参赛团队在几天时间内完成的，和现实中落地于市场的项目会有差距。

 1. Guidl ：Web3游戏公会

    功能：进入工会获得灵魂代币->在工会中寻找玩同款游戏的成员->使用这些成员的道具->提升道具利用效率、打金产出（例：web2游戏csgo只能队友发皮肤枪，web3游戏登录Guidl可直接使用别人道具），其中道具只能无损耗的使用，不能卖掉等

    评价：基于智能合约的共享，解决用户借用别人道具、借给别人道具的需求
 2. Burn my wallet：网络安全

    项目方是前coinbase高级软件工程师，其概念为灵魂bounding代币。实现方式为使用项目->获得一个soul bound token（不可转移）->给钱包打标签，如果钱包被盗->通过协议取消DAO投票权、冻结代币（防止转入黑洞账户等）、阻止他人转账

    评价：思路很超前，譬如取消散户的voting power不太重要，而大户由未必会信任和使用，想要得到市场认可需要很多资源
 3. Tsukiji：Opensea支持的项目（NFT交易）

    opensea购买nft只能单个购买，gem可以扫地板多个购买

    Tsukiji特点：可以同时购买多个项目的nft，类似某宝购物车；可以用多种token购买，不局限于eth；可以使用户打包销售多个nft，给买方提供优惠等

    评价：获奖项目中实用性最强、刚需稳在的项目
 4. NFT safe launch：实现项目方和用户双赢（NFT发行）

    项目方使用NFT safe launch发行项目，用户即可监管项目方资金账户

    功能：用户持有nft->拥有社区治理权重->可投票阻止项目方某些行为（例：rug pull）->倒逼项目方认真做事->增进项目方和用户相互信任

    评价：君子协议，可能实际效力并不强（例：想rug pull的项目不会用此工具，真正想做事的项目用此协议又有可能受限制）
 5. Pearl：安全讯息聚合（社交）

    功能：加入discord社区->指定想看的社区用户->筛选并推送指定讯息+全新协议实现钱包对钱包的即时信息沟通

    评价：概念很好、落地很难
 6. Steam Tokenizer

    功能：将steam平台上的道具NFT化，实现方法为用户将库存转移到托管机器人账户，之后在steam tokenizer上映射出对应的NFT，从而可以在crypto市场交易

    评价：不满足链上问题链上解决，机器人账户不是智能合约，安全性未知；项目方是社区而不是游戏公司本身，可能发生rug pull；发展方向正确，市场前景广阔，未来gamefi应该聚焦于NFT本身而不是当下盘子的玩法

    个人补充：steam创始人Gabe曾明确禁止NFT内容上架平台，该项目实施可能会遇到更多困难；steam本来自身就有库存道具的交易平台，steam tokenizer未必能提升用户体验
 7. Reverb

    功能：web3音乐平台，Listen to earn，IPFS储存

    评价：想法比较老旧，这一类项目的通病是如何更好的将音乐产品货币化和打造社区环境，该项目并没有新颖的解决方案
 8. MeshLink

    功能：Dapps可视化分析平台，用户可在该平台设置并看到各种分析数据，已有官网

    评价：native web3分析平台，更好的分析需要看到具体的产品功能，提升用户体验（改善模块，优化算法等）是一大难点，对开发有很高的技术要求
 9. Safenode

    功能：安全性项目，收集整理钓鱼网站与虚假合约，帮助用户规避scam；可发起模拟交易，若交互中出现问题，则终止交易，保护用户资产安全

    评价：web3防火墙，此类项目常受大资本青睐；技术门槛高，没有代码基础无法从产品逻辑上深入分析，散户在早期没有参与机会；项目方是否会作恶是未知数
10. ETHdos

    功能：社交项目，基于ZK snark，用户透露自己有限的社交图谱，汇集成更完整的社交网

    评价：极客想法，比较贴切程序员、数学家，是否能被市场认可有待验证

总结：十个项目聚焦于NFT、gamefi以及底层基建，没有defi赛道，有可能未来市场的发展方向就是以太坊纽约聚焦的赛道

title: Defi发展史深度解读 vic会议纪要
body:
[https://youtu.be/RpAyPvMe1yM](https://youtu.be/RpAyPvMe1yM)

………………………………………………

往期会议回放：oasis中文频道

市场主要由情绪导向，牛市到来时大部分人还是会回来

………………………………………………

defi中三个有潜力的赛道：

DEX (Uniswap, Sushiswap)

借贷 (AAVE, Compound, MakerDAO)

流动性 (Tokemak, Olympus)

注：不建议在现阶段投资任何defi项目产品

………………………………………………

传统金融：对手盘（股票等）深度池子

Dex：流动性提供者（uni） xy=k 点对池

提供流动性：100元->50元x+50元y

流动性=Defi中的护城河

做LP=获得一定交易手续费

………………………………………………

先有鸡先有蛋：先有流动性还是先有交易对

Sushi：提供流动性->获得sushi代币（项目方拿自己代币补贴LP）

长期：持续释放的治理代币在市场上没有用处->一直通胀->拉盘控盘治理提案面临困境

蝗虫矿工=只关心apy，apr，挖提卖->代币一泻千里

………………………………………………

Curve=造血机器

目前各种脱锚，一路走低

长期锁仓收益率更高->激励矿工staking->经济模型正向运转

切准大户思路（做稳定币换币交易等）

Curve上用户少，但一直有大额交易=一直有业务收入

并非完美：其它一些采取ve模型的项目->没有业务收入->代币价格死亡螺旋

用户不愿意锁四年，时间太长，项目可能活不了这么长

CRV->cvxCRV（单向操作）：释放crv的流动性，无法获得veCRV

………………………………………………

总结：

Uni：占交易额>=75%

Curve：稳定币+pack资产（锚定），业务需求强

V3 Uni：分区间提供流动性（集中流动性）

只要行业存在，dex就能一直赚钱

竞争：争夺流动性，为什么要提供LP

应用场景：交易对

………………………………………………

Compound AAVE BendDAO

借贷模式：创建非常大的资金池

借贷方式：存入代币/NFT->借出ETH等

超额抵押：存入100usd的eth->借出30usd的其他代币

营收：向借贷池存入ETH->借钱人付一定年利率+治理代币奖励-项目方抽水

系统性金融风险：池子借空->失去流动性->面临清算->项目归零

项目条件：建立在足够的业务模式上

缺陷：没有staking机制->治理代币价格一直跌

………………………………………………

Token借贷

经典例子MakerDAO，存入100usd的btc/eth->换出30个DAI（1DAI=1usd），而算稳的难点在于其内在逻辑：无限印钱->通胀->脱锚，项目方为了防止这一事情发生必须创造更多交易对，这对于早期项目难以解决。想脱离庞氏骗局，就需要搞清楚应用场景是什么，如何给用户创造更多应用场景。

………………………………………………

NFT借贷

例：Jpegd：抵押NFT->发行PUSd，其难点在于nft借贷的用户更少，不符合nft玩家玩法（冲小图片换eth）逻辑。

Kaishi Market

每个池子对应单间（例：USDC只能和xSUSHI互换），不需要那么大流动性，做个简单的类比就是Compound vs Kaishi = 户外大温泉 vs 单间浴缸

………………………………………………

Defi的强劲指标是Curve，而Curve的TVL: 250亿->50亿（内在逻辑：流动性枯竭->连环清算->defi走下坡路）

………………………………………………

Olympus的介绍：

通过债券市场吸引流动性，用LP代币以折扣价格购买想要的治理代币，这样LP不全是蝗虫矿工，其中有看好项目的人（蝗虫矿工：只想要apy，挖提卖），同时项目方也通过出售治理代币获取了流动性，和流动性挖矿（类似租赁）不同。类似的NFTfi有Floor_DAO。

………………………………………………

Tokemak的介绍：

用户角色：流动性提供者(LP)、流动性引导者(LD)，LP在reactor单币质押（不同于一般defi的双币质押，例如质押eth一半换成usdc），LD质押token，获得投票权，将LP的流动性导入到指定的池子中

无偿损失保护：储备池中的资产+LD的收益+LD质押的token

项目特性：LP、LD所有的收益都是$TOKE，做市收入（如交易手续费）归tokemak所有

个人理解：存钱，协议帮你管理赚收益，类似理财产品

项目现状：TVL：24亿->1亿6000万，概念虽好，但币价80u->1u (-95%)，很多人亏麻了

项目未来：协议拥有的资产达到一定程度，便不再需要LP，只通过LD指引资产进入交易对，形成DAO

………………………………………………

CRV上的套娃：

Curve: 锁定Crv->veCrv（无法交易）

Convex: Crv->cvxCrv（加速器，释放流动性）

Clever: 将Convex上收益最大化，贿选自动收入

综合来讲，Curve套Convex套Clever，一层套一层，其实并没有走出defi的困境

………………………………………………

总结：defi很惨，市场现阶段（2022.7）凉凉，Twitter space上聊项目少，吹牛的多，加息继续跌，更多投机者（例如某些辍学all in web3）会被洗出局，年底可能有机会，接下来时间只建议持续学习+follow市场，保存实力

………………………………………………

杂记

投一级如何判断能赚钱：明确第二轮谁会入场+项目本身有业务现金流

很多DAO骗大家免费当劳动力为社区做贡献，创始人发币拿钱融资割韭菜，赚到钱就跑路

国人搞DAO的一些问题

[https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/u66m0xCZNBwuY8__4XtMvg](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/u66m0xCZNBwuY8__4XtMvg)

国人NFT千万别玩，割的亲妈不认，能跑多快跑多快（搞token要懂defi协议，搞nft只需要小图片，门槛低）

链上问题链上解决，链下问题放链上会出问题（stepN外挂）

title: 如何参与web3行业 vic会议纪要
body:
[https://youtu.be/tuOCmDZaJp8](https://youtu.be/tuOCmDZaJp8)

………………………………………………

Q&A环节

 1. 豆浆：职业互联网内容运营，做过数字藏品，觉得趋势是web3是下一代互联网，如何把握机会

    vic：适合做web3底层知识学习，看国外市场在干什么了解更多细节

    小拔：数字藏品不算真正的web3，建议亲自玩各种项目，增加对于运营/产品职位需要了解的底层逻辑的理解
 2. 张国涛：80后股权投资讲师，经朋友介绍入圈，从炒币到撸空投，想深入找工作岗位

    vic：适合继续观点输出，当博主（尽管比较卷），别的行业（譬如投资）需要更大的研究能力，主要收入：找alpha项目做投研
 3. 鸭毛君：艺术创作者，调研各音乐nft发推，如何涨粉快，增加曝光量

    vic：首先可以花钱砸流量，如果想真正发展有真正干货价值（别人不了解的东西），能否做大总与时间精力天赋直接有关

    小拔：要花钱花时间，做项目常要走弯路，吸引人靠真正insight，形成自己风格
 4. Pppp：杭州普通院校研究生，联盟链公司实习，想转公链公司工作+做纯技术类型博主，有何建议

    vic：研发岗位总有需求，博主可以直接推特起步，vic免费推广有干货的内容，国内的公链联盟链意义不大

    小拔：国内公链不太好，更推荐socialfi&gamefi
 5. 熊市梭哈者：草根如何参与？非精英、非开发者入行，哪个岗位切入点比较好？

    vic：增加投研能力，提升发现更好项目的眼光，抓住早期买入的机会
 6. 舆趣使然：21年应届生，游戏公司产品开发，web2和web3产品经理定位有何区别

    小拔：底层产品思维相似，web3需要更深的技术理解

    vic：web2集中在细节，web3集中在灵魂导向，告诉大家要做什么
 7. Devin：财经211商科大四，除了看文章视频加入社区，有什么快速了解行业的建议；除vc外有什么非技术核心岗位；是否要选择出国

    vic：详见youtube如何进入web3那期视频，出国选择过早，实习时间宝贵，选择一个研究赛道适合自己的公司，学历好=研究能力强，建议新人早期广泛涉猎，看优秀项目做总结

    小拔：建议培养自身为梯形人才，在某领域多输出，早期国内发展足够
 8. Lydia：语言专业毕业生，无技术背景如何进入行业；什么岗位更适合

    vic：任何人都能进入web3，行业/岗位选择需要赛道研究

    小拔：非技术岗位代码部分不太需要了解太多
 9. 张楠楠：医学研究生，如何将web3作为副业

    vic：二级市场投资，花一点时间精力follow项目
10. Huyij：web3信息渠道/工具有何推荐；有dao推荐

    vic：加更多社区，信息是否则优质需要自己判断；靠dao抱团取暖不如更多靠自己+

    小拔：师傅领进门修行靠个人，dao可能提供机会，利用靠自己
11. eve：qs200英国研究生，web2公司pr，能匹配到什么岗位；求职渠道有何推荐；写简历有何建议

    vic：女生all in成功率高于男生，适合nft赛道；找alpha项目需要混社区，web3没有传统web2找工作渠道

    小拔：推特上多发声，拓宽人脉，他人引荐
12. 电话用户188\*\*\*\*0096：交大会计专业，创业公司运营，web3有什么工作机会

    小拔：毕业做vc挑战大（找项目+判断能力），应届生一般缺资源和行业认知；建议先做项目积累行业认知和人脉
13. Jessica：qs150marketing，行业基础薄弱，去找基金还是项目方

    vic：选择靠自己，研究能力较欠缺，靠脸可以做FA，也可以做自媒体

    小拔：英语能力也是优势
14. 安妮：计算机专业，国内公链政府关系，nft前景如何；数字艺术有何机会

    vic：nft市场广阔，可能超越crypto，不喜欢现工作建议辞职

    小拔：数字艺术处于大早期，无法判断
15. comcom：华为oppo3c产品总监，裸辞全职web3有何建议

    vic：需要自己寻求舒适区，喜欢做博主还是科学家等
16. 菲菲：国内web3投资机构前五有何推荐

    小拔：国内crypto fund前三：IOSG Hashkey 分布式，看创始人历史

vic总结：

很多想入行者缺乏基础知识，需增加学习与理解。

对于好学历的人：少看土狗，多看优质项目，避免形成固有错误认知，学历好=研究能力强，早期起步快，发展还看运气。

对于普通人，门槛高赚钱难，持续学习让自己变得不普通，合约虽可能赚大钱但未必能拿住，他人运气路径不能复制，web3未必适合所有人，不适合可以换。

对于好看的女生：做kol自带优势，方便接触一手资源/信息。

如果没有陪伴参与项目从零到一，后期复盘难以体验真正的感受，一定要持续follow市场跟随潮流，玩新不玩旧。

title: 当我们在讨论“MaaS”的时候到底在讲什么？
body:
By Kyle, Investment Manager@Bing Ventures

从本轮周期的发展来看，在传统的Web2.0业务中植入DAO和MaaS（Metaverse-as-a-Service）似乎还没有非常成功的案例。Web3.0其实还远没有到和元宇宙深度耦合的阶段。Zilliqa是一个古老的Layer1区块链协议，正在尝试转型为支持扩展现实（XR）元宇宙，为其合作伙伴提供MaaS平台的底层基础设施。

在这篇文章中，我们探讨了MaaS是什么，以及自作为扩展现实元宇宙的解决方案推出以来，Zilliqa和其代币ZIL的表现如何，以及未来几个月值得关注的进一步增长催化剂。ZIL是Zilliqa区块链的生态系统代币。用户以 ZIL支付交易费用，然后将其分发给活动验证者及其各自的委托人，以换取保护网络。

## 什么是MaaS？

尽管MaaS这个概念看起来很新潮，但曾经类似的应用场景却十分普世，它在金融、游戏、商业等传统领域都有很多成熟的案例，本质上都是在元宇宙供给和需求两端搭建技术桥梁，让资金在两端之间更高效的运转。元宇宙的成功和大规模采用取决于用户自建的能力。换句话说，利用元宇宙即服务技术必须尽可能在去信任低摩擦的环境下进行。

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*PWu9gzJjMYkrTOGL)

目前公链项目当下在Web3的元宇宙中并未被验证可行，包括以太坊在内。但长期来看，在业务中尝试引入MaaS进行定制化的实践探索，有助于商业用户在MaaS产品中找到最大价值。它将使其用户能够从A-Z自定义自己的虚拟宇宙，并将成为多元互联网的基础。

那么，什么是 MaaS？这是一种品牌定制化的区块链服务模式。MaaS平台能够创建适合每个用户独特需求的数字环境，无论其设计如何如何。为了使元宇宙作为一个实用概念取得成功，MaaS解决方案将是关键。除了强大的交互能力和低门槛的物理世界门槛，MaaS还要定制化设计代币分发和流转的游戏规则，从而建立一个正反馈循环的用户激励系统。Zilliqa就是这样一个以有效的方式捕获协议价值的区块链网络。

## 分片技术：MaaS的完美答案

接下来我们需要对MaaS中经常讨论到的关键性技术指标做一个统一的定义。可扩展性和高容量对于元宇宙的主流采用至关重要。无论区块链增长的速度有多快，将区块链拆分为更小的片单元都会呈现出更轻的技术效果，从而大大减少执行负担。这是分片背后的主要思想。Zilliqa区块链已经在使用分片技术，使他们的区块链更轻，网络更快。

![来源：changelly](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*UdVU2hiIsH925ZGc)

分片的想法是通过将区块链划分为更轻的单元来提高效率。这些“碎片”存储着不同类型的数据，并且独立于其他分片。使用分片技术的区块链项目正在采用不同的策略来创建分片之间的有效通信。Zilliqa使用称为Partitioned sharding的分片技术。

在Zilliqa区块链中，分片发生在三个不同的层中：

* \*\*网络分片：\*\*网络的节点分为不同的分片。然后，每个分片将负责处理传入事务的子集。例如，如果有1000个节点，那么通过网络分片，Zilliqa可以将它们分成10个不同的分片。在此方案中，网络可以扩展 10 倍以处理更多事务。
* \*\*事务分片：\*\*传入的事务在不同的分片之间划分。然后，每个分片将处理事务并将其发送回负责节点进行捆绑。根据交易类型，分配策略会有所不同。一般来说，分片节点负责处理支付和简单的智能合约交易，而DS委员会负责处理智能合约链的执行。
* \*\*计算分片：\*\*此机制用来划分计算能力来处理节点之间的交易。不幸的是，没有关于这一机制细节的文件。

事务和计算分片是建立在网络分片之上的。通过这种方式，分片允许整个网络有效地访问余额和交易数据，但不需要网络上的每个节点都有自己整个记录的巨大副本。节点仅处理它们被分配到的分片。最大化每秒可以确认的交易数量。Metapolis正是使用Zilliqa区块链的分片技术而构建的高度沉浸式和游戏化的XR元宇宙平台，具有高度可扩展性，比其他区块链使用更少的能源。

## 穹顶之下的操作能力

Metapolis作为第一个基于Zilliqa创造的Metaverse-as-a-service平台，亮点包括：

* **专为互操作性而构建** — Metapolis城市之间的开放式传送模式确保了它是一个没有数字边界的多元宇宙。
* **先进的游戏引擎** — 使用Unity技术，确保每个地点在视觉上都引人入胜，并且完全具有可操作性。
* **用户安全至上**- Metapolis通过了解您的客户（KYC）检查和监管来确保最高级别的安全性。

目前Metapolis主要还是通过线下的资源拓展去打开定制化的需求缺口。Metapolis正在推出一项新计划，以支持专注于可持续时尚的创作者，并为Metapolis头像创建时尚NFT。Metapolis将成为同类平台中第一个提供这种程度的个性化功能和API集成的平台。

进入后，用户可以获得完全可定制的NFT头像，这些头像将在Metapolis中代表他们的数字身份，用户将能够完成诸如参加音乐会和时装秀，在城市之间传送以及访问、购买，出售或交易数字资产等。随着用例的增加，Metapolis已经开始寻找更绿色的农场。

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*BD2vY1ewNYcjPDD1)

Metapolis的日益成功预示着Zilliqa的光明未来。Metapolis的增长目前受到规模化开发者数量有限和Zilliqa牵引力的阻碍。这是一个短期问题，因为Zilliqa正在引入\*\*软件开发工具包（SDK）\*\*帮助具有不同技术能力的用户来创建游戏。

Metapolis优先关注P2E的游戏和NFT行业是正确的。用户将有更广泛的机会利用其NFT和资本来实现收益机会。在Web3中，Zilliqa的技术正在连接虚拟世界和物理世界。试图在根本上解决这样的问题，即人们成为协议的用户，并在过程中获得收益。如何在不需要信任的情况下，实现这样的目标。如何让代币最终自然而然流向真正能够帮助协议正反馈循环的用户手上。因此在MaaS引入货币市场显然很必要。

## 一切为了Earn，为Earn设计MaaS

当谈及MaaS的时候，我觉得务必不能忽略X-to-Earn在其中的重要性。往小里说，X-to-Earn是项目创造归属、凝聚共识、建立共同利益的纽带；往大里说，X-to-Earn是决定MaaS以何种方式服务于代币持有者，并为他们持续创造利润的核心经济模型。

MaaS更加考验Metapolis对于SBT（Soulbound Token）和权益类NFT应用场景设计的探索。我有这种很强烈的预感，下一个MetaFi牛市的到来，大概率会跟Soulbound发展的关键性节点密切相关。一切为了Earn，为Earn设计精巧的MaaS才是正道。Web3最终也一定会回归到满足用户需求、沉淀用户价值这些基本商业逻辑上去。

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*an70lGwTH13fZ3y9)

尽管Metapolis起步相对缓慢，但随着未来团队尝试更多的原生代币激励，将进一步释放P2游戏扩展解决方案的进一步发展和用户采用。在整个MaaS中，设计围绕业务而非流动性的代币治理和挖矿是必不可少的环节，这是时代天平向Web3.0倾斜最主要的目的。

像Zilliqa这样以速度、兼容性和互操作性为重点的Layer1公链必须加快实现EVM（以太坊虚拟机）支持，从而简化其他应用生态向Zilliqa的迁移。特别是扩展DeFi产品对于元宇宙初始流动性池的支持。尤其Web3正处于最大程度吸纳Web2用户规模和用户需求时，协议需要承诺加大对治理角色的奖励力度。单纯就商业模式的角度来看，MaaS的设计只有朝着X-to-Earn和治理挖矿的方向前进，Metapolis协议未来才会存在中长期升值的可能性。

title: No, Stadia isn’t shutting down by the end of summer
body:
A rumor has been circulating this week suggesting Google plans to shut down Stadia by the end of summer, but there’s no reason to really believe that’s the case.

First launched in 2019, Google Stadia had a strong first year full of major AAA titles, but some enthusiasm around the service diminished following [last year’s closure](https://9to5google.com/2021/02/01/google-shuts-down-first-party-stadia-games-entertainment/) of Google’s first-party studio Stadia Games & Entertainment. Despite that, Stadia has continued to fill out its library with games large and small, with Google aiming to bring at least 100 new titles per year.

This week, a rumor was shared in a Stadia fan group on Facebook (the original post has since been removed), in which a person claiming to have connection with a Google employee alleged that Stadia would be shut down in the near future. The rumor, posted by a user with the name “Donny Jepp” — claims that at a Google retail seminar in California, the company shared their “exit plan” for Stadia, shutting down the game streaming service by “the end of summer.”

The poster went on to claim that Stadia would receive treatment “like they did with Google Play Music,” with customers to be informed 30-60 days ahead of time but not moved to another platform. This comparison is strange though, as Google [transitioned Play Music customers](https://9to5google.com/2020/05/12/youtube-play-music-transition/) and features to YouTube Music. Google Play Music customers also had far more than 60 days notice — closer to five months — to move over to YouTube Music.

Beyond the inconsistencies within the rumor’s claims, there’s simply no truth to the idea of Stadia shutting down in the near future. For starters, the last day of summer 2022 is September 23, and multiple titles have been confirmed to release on Stadia after that date, including FIFA 23 on September 30. Moreover, we’re already less than 60 days from the end of summer, so Google would’ve needed to start sending notices out by now.

title: Living a lie: Self-presentation for online identity
body:
Identity reconstruction through digital strategic self-presentation has been a ubiquitous phenomenon since the days of 4chan and MySpace. While these social media are considered archaic forums by today’s standards, in comparison to Snapchat and Instagram, they have been witnesses and curators of the phenomenon we encounter even today for digital identity and the formation of digital communities.  

What started as a community formed by NEETS and nerds who felt socially excluded and decided to take things into their own hands, has today gained so much popularity, it is considered abnormal to not be a part of these communities. And as in any community, digital communities have their fair share of phenomena that the nerds in academia aim to explain with big words- which is exactly what I will be doing. 

Instagram and the influencer lifestyle have bought about inflation in the importance of physical phenotype and digital social capital. Vanity and narcissism are normalized to an extent where only the most severe cases receive negative attention- which doesn’t really help resolve the problem because the “all publicity is good publicity” philosophy is now applied to individuals’ lives who make a brand out of themselves and use that publicity for more revenue. Social capital now is not determined in terms of contribution to the society or family name or wealth, but by whether you can convince the bags of flesh in front of their plastic screens, that you have what you claim to have and lived the experiences you project.  If you’re successful at this art of conning, you leave with the bundle of cash from your courses or advertisements and your audience leaves with the delusion that they can have what you do- everyone is happy. We live in a world of lies, and we love it.  

This house of mirrors phenomenon leads to people believing that whatever they perform and broadcast on the internet will bring them money and clout. And they wouldn’t be wrong. There’s a market for almost everything on the internet, and everyone and their entitled self can fill the emptiness within them with money and validation. Give me $100 for this PDF which is essentially a copypasta but I'll teach you how you can achieve the life I have; no, the original price was $500 but it’s on sale for a short period; no, I don’t make most of my money by selling the course to fools like you.  Creator economy- where I create lies and you eat it up from my palms. 

Moving towards a society where the “creator economy” is ardently supported, we turn a blind eye to the fact that we are slowly shaping society in a way where putting your life on blast while taking major creative liberty to narrate the experiences, is normalized and even revered. Creator economy as a way to get paid for the ads we watch or the data that companies sell from us, in my opinion, is nothing more than a marketing scheme to onboard people where the early adopters hopefully make it big and the ones coming in after the hype cope with the FOMO until the ones coping create another scheme and the cycle continues. We will keep creating one Ponzi after another. Nothing changes, time is a flat circle. 

Talking about selling our personal data, we are doomed. If you’re a privacy nut, good luck saying primitive and unable to keep your lineage living prosperously or even surviving long enough when microchips become all the hype. Good luck with your grandkids getting bullied in school for not being able to access information in 0.01 sec with the microchip in their brain and using primitive smartphones- who even does that? Best believe your ideals about privacy and data protection will cost your future family because the government will want your data and they’ll find a way to get it, sooner or later. Half-memeing, but you can’t resist. 

Sure, cryptography has been advancing and achieving some pretty cool feats with privacy protocols, but there’s always a Stephen Diehl who will protest vocally against privacy protocols regarding how unsecure it is while forming a company that benefits from this very technology and capitalizing on the sheeple who give him their data so he can “keep it safe”.  Privacy nut or “what are u hiding” tard, you’re doomed either way because someone will always come up with a plan to make money off of you and you will fall for it. You will have no escape, and you will be happy. 

Aight that’s enough for today. Stop thinking anymore about this cause even if we reach a point where we can transfer our consciousness into a disc and manufacture an everlasting body, you probably won’t get a chance to be “revived” cause you are poor. Life is short, stop wasting your time thinking about pointless things like I do. GL HF.

title: Ethereum 2.0 changes, where will Ethereum and Miner go?
body:
**Arthor**: Daling reseaech — bocaibocai.eth

Since the launch of the mainnet in 2015, Ethereum has gone through several updates. Currently, Ethereum is in the third stage of its four planned stages (Frontier, Homestead, Metropolis, Serenity) and is about to start the final stage. In the Serenity stage, the consensus mechanism will convert from POW to POS after the merge of Ethereum beacon chain and origin chain.

Ethereum upgrade could affect the interests of different parties, which are worth billions of dollars. The core developers of Ethereum are very cautious, since the slightest mistake may cause irreparable losses to Ethereum. As a result, the upgrade of Ethereum 2.0 progresses very slowly.

***Will the upgrade be beneficial for Ethereum? Will the upgrade go smoothly? Is it the right time to participate Ethereum mining now?***

Not really, the upgrade of Ethereum 2.0 is not only a technical problem, but many other factors could affect the upgrade results as well.

We will discuss this from different perspectives listed below:

* Compared with POW, the POS mechanism has a lower threshold for participation, saving more energy, however, with lower mining profits. It is no longer a good time to participate in the POW, and the POS seems to be a good alternative.
* The change of the consensus mechanism will greatly affect the profit distribution: under POW mechanism, miners will share most of the mining profits, however, this will be distributed to the Ethereum Foundation and large ETH holders under the POS mechanism. Many miners have to find alternative ways, such as  participating in other POW mining, industrial transformation,  participating in other Web3 protocols, or selling off all mining equipment. This leads to much dissatisfaction among POW miners.
* Although POS exceeds POW in terms of security, due to the existence of the joint stake agreement, the centralization problem of Ethereum under the POS equity proof mechanism will be more serious. Is an overly centralized Ethereum really safe?
* Ethereum looks more like "Vitalik's Ethereum" or "Ethereum Foundation's Ethereum". The number of Ethereum requirements for users who want to participate in governance, even for whales, is extremely high. And the potential proposals are mostly technical ones, which are limited in a narrow niche. The core developers will have the decision-making power which is executed by miners. The users seem can only express some ideas that no one really cares about.
* The likelihood of a death spiral is minimal in terms of the tokenomics of Ethereum and other market factors. However, there are still many potential unknown risks could affect Ethereum upgrade, such as hard forks, malicious selling from miners, etc.

## How to participate in Ethereum mining now? Where should POW miners go in the future?

**(1) Pros and cons of mining under POS and POW mechanism:**

**POW Proof of Work Consensus Mechanism**

In a simple way, miners continuously enumerate a Nonce (a random number) to strive for the right to record the block.

* Pros: No need to buy ETH to get started. Compared with the POS mechanism, it is easier to implement: purchase the equipment that is needed for building a node and start mining. POW is a proven and tested consensus mechanism that has maintained the safety and decentralization of Bitcoin and Ethereum for many years.
* Cons: Not environmental-friendly. It consumes a lot of energy every year, and as the computing power continues to increase, the mining revenue will decrease, and the pool's computing power growth may lead to centralization and security risks. Under the POW mechanism, most of the revenue of Ethereum is distributed to miners.

**POS Proof of Stake Consensus Mechanism**

In a simple way, the stakers’ staking weight is used to fight for the right to record the block.

* Pros: more environmental-friendly. Miners do not need to buy a lot of hardware and consume energy to invest, they just need to hold enough ETH to participate, and it can effectively reduce the selling pressure of ETH. This is because miners under the POW mechanism will sell the ETH from block reward to compensate mining cost. Moreover, the POS mechanism can effectively improve the TPS (speed of processing transactions) of Ethereum and improve the congestion of Ethereum.
* Cons: It is still in its infancy and has not been tested for long-term practical applications, so there may be potential problems that have not been seen.

**(2) Are POW and POS Mining suitable to enter now?**

**POW mechanism profits**

The biggest beneficiary under the Ethereum POW mechanism is miners and the mining equipment manufacturers, which can produce 11.3 million ETH or $13.56 billion revenue per year (calculated at $1,200/ETH on June 16, 2022). As the continuous growth of computing power, the demand for mining equipment such as graphics cards has increased significantly, which indirectly benefits GPU chip companies NVIDIA and AMD, adding $455 billion to the market value of these two manufacturers in 2021. But with the market entering the bear market, the price of Ethereum keeps falling. As of July 12, 2022, the computing power of the entire network was 904.59TH/S.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KJRa38s8eoMpXiCDWkv0i.png?height=472&width=946)

With the sluggish price of ETH, the mining's income has also fluctuated greatly. From ATH of 0.282 USD/day per 1M computing power down to only 0.017USD/day per 1M computing power. The current GPU graphics card price is based on a 3060Ti at the market price 563.52 USD, computing power of 61M and 0.074 USD per kilowatt-hour of electricity calculation, the static return period is nearly 800 days, which does not seem to be a good time to enter the market.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FVMiPer1GsHgivkFn982W.png?height=402&width=1080)

**Profit of POS mechanism**

After the implementation of the POS mechanism, miners don’t have to spend a lot of money to purchase hardware thus increasing computing power to obtain more income, but to stake more ETH to obtain higher income. Ethereum 2.0 has a staking yield curve, as the amount of staked ETH decreases, the rate of return will increase. And as the amount of staked ETH increases, the rate of return will decrease. As of July 12, 2022, the rate of return for staking ETH is about 4.2% annually.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ziyChMBLuUgmgO4jj75Z2.png?height=290&width=1080)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fXjgEvNIDt9Nw7CfxA7UE.png?height=233&width=953)

There are currently four POS staking options available:

**Separate staking**: 32 ETH and a professional computer are required.
Pros: Access to full rewards and full control of your own;

Cons: It is necessary to keep the continuation power supply, otherwise there will be a relatively small inactivity penalty.

**Service provider staking**: No equipment required, 32 ETH is required.
Pros: No need to spend equipment costs, no need to maintain equipment;
Cons: Unable to obtain full rewards, node fees need to be paid, and there is a certain trust risk.

**Collection Staking**: No equipment, any funds.
Pros: low capital threshold, liquidity can be withdrawn at any time;
Cons: Unable to obtain full rewards, third-party platform trust risk, smart contract execution risk.

**Centralized trading platform**: No wallet, any funds.
Pros: convenient and fast, low capital threshold;
Cons: There are certain risks in the trading platform, and validators are so concentrated that they would threaten the network.

From the above comparison, it can be seen that for those who want to participate in Ethereum mining, it seems to be an unwise choice to participate the POW mining since mining cost is high and the return cycle is too long. Choosing the POS mechanism seems to be the best way to participate in Ethereum mining. The cost depends on the price range of ~~buying~~ ETH purchased, and the income is relatively stable and there is no energy consumption cost.

**(3)** **Where are miners heading after changing to the POS mechanism**

Due to the conversion of the POS mechanism, a large number of POW mining nodes will not be able to participate in the mining of Ethereum, and the number of active nodes in Ethereum is expected to drop significantly, which will lead to the migration of a large number of POW miner computing power to other POW mechanism chains (such as ETC) or other web3 protocols. However, the huge computing power that are controlled by Ethereum POW miners is very difficult to digested by another ecological system. Moreover, the migration of computing power will also reduce the mining revenue of the migrated ecology, which also leads to a significant number of miners have to sell their mining equipment to compensate for the loss. There will be a large number of second-hand graphics cards on the market, and the scene of hard-to-find cards may no longer exist.

At present, there are two main tpyes of Ethereum mining devices: ASIC and GPU. ASICs (Application-Specific Integrated Circuits) are computer hardware designed for a specific purpose, and hashing algorithms for Ethereum are written in the Ethereum ASIC mining device. Graphics card-based GPU Mining devices can solve complex PoW calculations and can also be used for more general-purpose applications.

The problem with Ethereum ASIC Mining equipment is that it can only be used for ETH mining and cannot be used for mining with other algorithms. Ethereum Classic (ETC) is the only POW project that can use Ethereum ASIC Mining because Ethereum Classic’s POW algorithm is compatible with Ethereum. At present, the mining income of ETC is already lower than that of ETH under the same conditions. The computing power per 1M is only 0.0116 USD/day, and the static return period reaches more than 1000 days. If a large number of miners flock to ETC, it will cause computing power increase. If the surging revenue declines, then the mining profits of ETC will become unprofitable, and the ASIC mining equipment may be worthless.

For GPU mining devices, there are several options after the Ethereum merge~~r~~.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/T43cCFSYZniX_99ewsU4v.png?height=386&width=1080)

**Digging into other POW mechanism Tokens**

According to Messari's research, the total value of the POW token projects currently available for mining by other GPU mining devices other than ETH is only 3% of the total mineable profit, and the huge computing power of Ethereum cannot be absorbed in other POW tokens, which is only an option available to a few.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I-2grca-vPPAH9gn-QPbF.png?height=529&width=1080)

**Expand business scope**

For a large-scale Miner innovative Mining company, it may be a good choice to expand into new business scope. Hut 8 is one of the largest digital asset miners in North America focusing on innovation, bullish on Bitcoin, blockchain, and Web3.0. Bridging the emerging and traditional high-performance computing world, and has invested heavily in high-performance GPU graphics card mining equipment, which allows them to use GPU graphics cards for other high-performance computing power businesses.

January 31, 2022 Hut 8 announced the completion of the acquisition of the TeraGo data center business, through which Hut 8 changed its business structure, creating the first hybrid data center model, while serving traditional high-performance computing (Web2 ) and Web3 and the emerging digital asset computing department. After the merger of Ethereum, the transformed traditional high-performance computing power business and Web3 computing power services related to Web3 infrastructure will be big miner's new revenue source opportunities, but it is obvious that this choice requires the miner to have top-level resources and a large scale, and it is not a path that ordinary miners can choose.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qfyMVQObTzuZUk5aC0MGl.png?height=435&width=1591)

**Provide computing power for Web3 protocol**

Miners can turn GPU computing power to provide computing power for a few web3 protocols such as: Render Network, Livepeer Network, Akash Network, etc.

Render Network is a high-performance distributed rendering network based on GPU. Users can consume RNDR's GPU computing power to render images at a faster speed and at a lower cost. At the same time, miners can also provide its own GPU to provide rendering computing power for Render Network to earn rewards

Livepeer Network is a decentralized video transcoding network built on the Ethereum blockchain. Livepeer provides a back-end video transcoding and distribution infrastructure on which developers can build applications. Miners can provide GPU computing power to run a node on the Livepeer network that earns block rewards by charging fees for video transcoding.

Akash Network, the world’s first decentralized and open-source cloud, accelerates deployment, scale, efficiency and price performance for high-growth industries like blockchain and machine learning/AI. Known as the “Airbnb for Cloud Compute”, Akash Network provides a fast, efficient and low-cost application deployment solution. Developers leveraging the Akash platform can access cloud computing at three times the cost of centralized providers such as Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure. Akash Network leverages containerization and open source technologies to leverage 85% of the underutilized cloud computing power of 8.4 million global data centers, enabling anyone to buy and sell cloud computing, and Miner can use GPU Mining devices to provide Akash Network Cloud computing power to earn block rewards.

**Sell mining equipment for ETH and stake POS or hold cash for other purposes**

Miner uses the funds obtained from selling mining equipment in exchange for ETH to become a POS validator node to obtain block rewards or to obtain additional income in the form of MEV (Miner extractable value), which requires the validator to stake at least 32 ETH to receive block rewards. The rate of return will change with the amount of ETH staked and network activities. For miners who have less than 32 ETH or are unwilling to take the risk of node operation, they can obtain income through collection staking or staking of service providers. For most miners even if the POS skating income is not as high as POW, it is a long-term sustainable profit option

Since Ethereum POW carries a huge amount of computing power that other ecosystems can hardly absorb such huge computing power, ~~so~~ not every POW miner can find a profitable solution for computing power transfer, so a large number of miners may choose to sell mining equipment to cover the cost.

## What are other potential risks of Ethereum 2.0 upgrade?

**(1) "Oligopoly governance"?**

As one of the largest public chain ecosystems in Web3, governance has always been an aspect of great concern. The people involved in governance in Ethereum are mainly divided into three groups.

**Users:** End users who hold ETH and use Ethereum applications, trading platforms, and developers building applications on top of Ethereum.

**Miners:** An individual or business entity that runs a server node to validate transactions and secure the network (and earn ETH).

**Ethereum Core Developers:** Developers and researchers who contribute to node software and participate in various technical forums.

Anyone can submit a proposal called Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) on Github. It is not difficult to propose; the difficulty is to make the proposal reasonable and supported by the community. Once the EIP is submitted, it will go through a cycle of technical review, research and discussion.

* Draft - When properly formatted, the EIP editor will merge the EIP into the EIP repository
* ReviewEIP - The author marks the EIP as ready and requests peer review.
* Last Call - An EIP that has gone through its initial iteration and is ready to be reviewed by the community.
* Accepted - An EIP has been in Last Call for at least two weeks, and the developer has addressed all requested technical changes.
* Final - EIPs that the core developers have decided to implement into various clients (Geth, Nethermind, etc.) and release in a future hard fork, or EIPs that have already been released in a hard fork.

The proposal procedure shows that it is very inefficient to implement a proposal, and that the core Ethernet developers hold absolute decision-making power, which reflects some of the problems with Ethereum governance.

The governance mechanism tends to be oligarchic: Ethereum currently reaches consensus through the off-chain community, and proposals must be approved by the community. However, the proposal process is generally controlled by core developers for discussion and many node operators decide whether to implement it or not. ETH holders only have the right to express their opinions off-chain without actual voting rights. Compared with on-chain governance, the democratic foundation has certain deficiencies, and the personal influence of Vitalik is too strong. One person has a decisive influence on the entire Ethereum community.

The governance structure is too narrow: Currently, most of the EIP proposals are proposed by core developers and foundations, and the content mainly includes technology upgrades and patches. With the gradual maturity of Ethereum, issues such as compliance, secondary market, decentralized financial ecology or user experience need to be discussed in the proposal, not just at the technical level, but the technology upgrade is what developers are good at. In this field, the threshold for ordinary participants to participate in governance is too high.

From the perspective of the governance framework, the governance of Ethereum is completely dependent on the core developers of Ethereum and miner. It seems that participation in governance is a very high threshold for ordinary users. At present, the upgrade proposal of Ethereum 2.0 does not mention any changes to the governance structure. After the upgrade of Ethereum 2.0, Ethereum may still continue to have this centralized governance structure. If there is a disagreement within the Ethereum Foundation or serious problems with the influence and credibility of Vitalik, Ethereum may enter a state of governance chaos, which is a relatively big risk for the overall ecosystem of Ethereum. The Ethereum Foundation and Vitalik may need to consider how to optimize the governance structure.

**(2) After the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade, security enhancement can also be reflected in the cost of doing evil for POW and POS.**

**The Cost of Doing Evil Under the POW Mechanism**

In brief, the POW mechanism determines the right of block creation by computing power, and the security of this mechanism comes from the decentralization of computing power. In theory, if someone controls more than 50% of the computing power, he has the absolute advantage of obtaining the right of bookkeeping. It means he can create blocks faster, and then tampers with the blockchain data. If someone wants to do evil under the POW mechanism, he needs to control more than 50% of the total computing power of the entire network, and launch a "51% attack". If someone wants to launch a "51% attack", firstly he needs to have more computing power than other miners, which requires a very large amount of money to buy equipment and pay a lot of electricity bills. In addition, the computing power distribution is completely transparent on the blockchain network, and everyone can see what percentage of computing power the leading groups have. When someone tries to buy a large number of mining hardware to increase the computing power until it exceeds 51%, other miners will notice this matter and also add computing power to prevent concentration, which makes it extremely expensive and difficult to increase his computing power proportion beyond 51%. From an economic point of view, the cost of launching a "51% attack" is too high and the profit is too small which is not as good as honest mining. Therefore, it is also a question of whether it is worthwhile to launch a "51% attack".

**The Cost of Doing Evil Under the POS Mechanism**

In brief, the POS mechanism determines the chance of creating block by the amount of staked ETH and the security of this mechanism comes from the decentralization of staking. Under the POS mechanism, in order to launch an attack, someone needs to stake more than 51% of the ETH in the pool. In this case, the attack cost is much higher than that of the POW mechanism. Besides, the POS mechanism has a forfeiture mechanism. If the validator behaves dishonestly, his stake can be slashed. In the POW mechanism, the mining hardware purchased has at least residual value, while in the POS mechanism, once the assets are forfeited, it is an irreversible huge loss. The necessity of launching an attack under the POS mechanism is also controversial (what kind of profit is worth the risk of losing all the principal). In terms of security, the POS mechanism is superior to the POW mechanism.

**(3) While enhancing security, Ethereum 2.0 may face more serious centralization problems**

**The centralization problem under the POW mechanism before the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade**

As the Ethereum ecosystem grows larger and larger, the number of users is increasing, and the computing power of the entire network continues to grow. Under the POW mechanism, miners with low computing power have a very small chance of getting block rewards by mining, so it is a  popular choice for small miners to join a Pool (a pool that gathers the computing power of large and small miners). Gathering a lot of computing power, pools have greatly increased probability of mining blocks and then distributing the rewards to miners according to a certain distribution method. However, with the continuous expansion of the pools, Ethereum’s computing power has shown a trend of centralization. A large amount of computing power is concentrated in several pools. According to the data from Etherscan, the top three pools are Ethermine (28.2340%), F2Pool Old (13.2992%), and Hiveon Pool (10.4076%). The excessive concentration of computing power seriously threatens the security of Ethereum ecosystem, which is the biggest concern for the Ethereum Foundation. Now the combined computing power of the top three pools has exceeded 51%. If they launch a "51% attack" jointly, it can be definitely achieved. From the perspective of Vitalik and the Ethereum Foundation, the rapid growth of the miner group has enabled the "miner alliance" to threaten the security of the Ethereum network, which is a thing that Vitalik and the Ethereum Foundation fear and cannot tolerate.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8G2_SnheDIgPLRRhRtHFv.png?height=712&width=1080)

**The centralization problem under the POS mechanism after the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade**

Since the POS mechanism determines the chance of creating block by the amount of staked ETH, this means the centralization problem of Ethereum has changed from the centralization of computing power to the centralization of staking. This is an absolute advantage for ETH whales. At the same time, the existence of staking protocols will also lead to more severe centralization problems. Due to the existence of liquid staking protocols such as Lido and other collection staking service providers, many Miners who are dissatisfied with 32 ETH threshold or do not want to take the risk of node operation will choose to participate in collection staking, which will lead to excessive concentration of ETH on one protocol or staking service provider.

The current staking distribution chart of Ethereum shows that 31.72% of the total staked ETH is on Lido protocol, and 14.52% of the total staking is on Coinbase, which ranks second. The centralization of the market is very obvious. In addition, because of the intrinsic characteristics of POS, the rich may become richer and richer, and the chips of giant whales will continue to increase, making the chips of retail investors to be a drop in the bucket. What’s more, the Ethereum Foundation holds a large amount of ETH and has an absolute advantage. After the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade, the centralization problem will become increasingly serious. But at the same time, considering the cost of doing evil, the security of POS mechanism is much higher than that of POW mechanism at the mathematical level. The combination of higher security and more centralized trends may seem contradictory, which has also been a hot controversy over Ethereum 2.0.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xN-cB9CvtvCeQOIVFtEDk.png?height=970&width=1080)

**(4) After the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade, will there be a death spiral in Ethereum under extreme market conditions?**

**What is death spiral?**

Will the changes in the consensus mechanism of Ethereum 2.0 put Ethereum at a potential risk of death spiral? Before discussing this issue, it is necessary to understand what a death spiral is. In brief, it is a vicious cycle that leads to a series of stampede reactions and finally collapses.

It’s just like when LUNA crashed. The mechanism of LUNA is that $1 worth of LUNA can mint $1 worth of UST. Smart contracts cannot be tampered with, and this mechanism maintains the value of UST through market arbitrage. When Terra had liquidity problems, UST depegged from the value of $1, and a large number of people bought UST minted LUNA for under $1 for arbitrage. Many people buy UST for less than $1 to mint LUNA for arbitrage. More and more LUNA was minted, but the liquidity of the stablecoins on the Terra quickly dried up as many people sold LUNA. Many people began to use cross-chain bridges to transfer assets, causing blockchain congestion, so that people cannot  arbitrage to eliminate the price difference. Panic began to spread and the death spiral finally started. More and more UST holders minted LUNA with devalued UST and dumped it.LUNA was hyperinflationary and was sold off heavily. As UST remains decoupled, UST holders continue to mint LUNA, and LUNA continues to inflate. LUNA will be constantly minted as long as UST does not return to $1 value. However, due to liquidity exhaustion, UST could not return to $1, and the price of LUNA could not stop the plunge until the Terra blockchain stopped creating blocks. LUNA's death spiral was caused by the joint efforts of flawed economic model design, liquidity problems and a stampede of panic.

**Will there be a death spiral in Ethereum 2.0？**

Let’s see the economic model of Ethereum. Under the POW mechanism, ETH is mined by computing power, and consumed by paying GAS fees to complete on-chain transactions. After converting to POS, the way to obtain ETH will be staking ETH and getting incentivised. Compared with the POW mechanism, the inflation under the POS mechanism is lower, from about 4.3% to about 0.22%. Thanks to the Ethereum network's performance enhancement and cost reduction, the demand for Ethereum network usage will also increase, and thus stimulate the growth of burning volume. In terms of the tokenomics, Ethereum does not have a binding mechanism of burning and minting like LUNA, so Ethereum does not have a design flaw that will lead to a death spiral.

When the price of Ethereum fluctuates violently, will stakers withdraw their staked ETH and sell it, which leads to a death spiral of ETH? In terms of the staking mechanism, before the "Shanghai upgrade", stakers cannot withdraw the staked ETH; after the "Shanghai upgrade", withdrawal is opened, and stakers will be free to withdraw the staked ETH. So when the price of Ethereum fluctuates violently, will people withdraw their staked ETH and sell off?

Analysing from the perspective of investors’ psychology, when the market fluctuates violently, it is usually small investors who panic and sell assets at a low price, while large investors usually buy low and sell high. Therefore, even if the price of Ethereum fluctuates sharply, it is true that some people will withdraw their staked ETH and sell it, but it will not lead to a death spiral.

First of all, the rewards of Ethereum staking will fluctuate with the total value of staked ETH. For the firm holders of Ethereum, the reduction of staked volume will increase their yield rate. Even if the price of Ethereum fluctuates violently, it is only a short-term selling pressure for Ethereum, which is not enough to cause a stampede market. For the firm holders of Ethereum, it is a really good thing for them to buy chips at a low price at this time. In addition, the increase in yield rate caused by the reduction in the amount of staking will attract more staking, which may just be a constant shuffling process for Ethereum rather than a death spiral.

So under what circumstances will everyone sell off Ethereum and lead to a death spiral? I think it may only be a very serious problem in Ethereum itself that causes the entire ecosystem to collapse. This situation currently appears to be almost impossible.

**(5). Since the probability of the death spiral happening is very small, will Ethereum 2.0 have a hard fork because of the disagreement with miners?**

Before discussing whether there will be a hard fork in Ethereum 2.0, let’s explain what a hard fork and a soft fork are and what is the difference between them.

When there is a serious disagreement in the blockchain, it may cause a fork. Besides, the addition and upgrade of some protocols may also need to be implemented through forks.

**Hard fork:** A hard fork is defined as a permanent divergence in the blockchain. After the release of the new consensus, some nodes that have not been upgraded cannot verify the blocks generated by the upgraded nodes. At this time, a hard fork will occur. When a hard fork occurs, two blockchains with the same ledger before a certain block are created.

The most typical case is the hard fork of Ethereum and Ethereum Classic: The DAO is a crowdfunding project initiated by the blockchain company [Slock.it](http://slock.it/). On April 30, 2016, The DAO project started crowdfunding, the project token is DAO, and the crowdfunding time was 28 days. The DAO raised more than 12 million Ethereum, accounting for 14% of the total amount of Ethereum at that time, which was worth more than 150 million US dollars. More than 11,000 people participated in this crowdfunding. But The DAO's code has a major flaw that allows attackers to steal ETH from the decentralized organization. The hackers stole roughly $50 million worth of ETH. This was a big blow to Ethereum at the time, so after intense discussions in the community, Vitalik Buterin, the founder of Ethereum, decided to implement a hard fork to roll back the losses. However, some people adhere to the principle that the blockchain cannot be tampered with and refuse to upgrade, so Ethereum was split into Ethereum Classic and Ethereum.

Soft forks: Soft forks are softer than hard forks. After the release of the new consensus, nodes that have not been upgraded will generate invalid blocks because they do not know the new consensus, resulting in temporary forks. The old and new nodes coexist without affecting the stability and effectiveness of the entire system. The old node can be compatible with the new node, but the new node cannot be compatible with the old node. The two will coexist on the chain until the upgrade is completed. The soft fork will not lead to the emergence of two blockchains.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TLvluef4TK73yjdMMfmBo.png?height=499&width=989)

Will there be a hard fork in Ethereum 2.0? My answer is there is a possibility. Although the upgrade proposal is mainly proposed and decided by the core developers of Ethereum, it will ultimately be executed by the miners. Since the upgrade of Ethereum 2.0 completely harmed the interests of miners and caused strong dissatisfaction among them. Most miners have no choice but to sell mining hardware and find another cryptocurrency to do mining works, so the upgrade of Ethereum is very likely to face resistance from miners. It is still possible for the miners to unite to sell in revenge, or initiate a hard fork.

## Summary

Compared with the POW mechanism, the POS mechanism has lower rewards, but it is more environmental-friendly, relatively centralized, less inflation, higher security and higher TPS. Although the ideal POS mechanism will make the Ethereum ecosystem more sustainable, it will be full of unknowns after it is truly implemented since it is not time-tested.

The POS mechanism makes the biggest beneficiaries transfer from the miners to the Ethereum Foundation and stakers, which arouses the dissatisfaction of stakeholders headed by miners, who face the problem of where to go. Although a small amount of computing power can be migrated to other ecosystems, most miners may have to sell mining hardware in exchange for ETH to become stakers or to do something else. This is a loss of interest for most miners, which makes it possible to encounter some retaliatory behaviors during the upgrade of Ethereum 2.0, such as selling off and hard forks.

Let’s explore the changes in Ethereum 2.0 from a few other views. In terms of governance structure, the decision-making of Ethereum is basically in the hands of the Ethereum Foundation and core developers. Besides, Vitalik’s personal influence is too large, and the scope of governance proposals is too narrow, which will lead to the oligarchy of Ethereum’s governance. In terms of potential risks, the probability of Ethereum's death spiral is minimal, but the more threatening risks actually come from the increasing trend of centralization. Especially after the implementation of the POS mechanism, collection staking makes the staking protocols like Lido coconcentrate a lot of staked ETH, resulting in serious centralization. However, it can be seen from the characteristics of Ethereum 2.0 that it has higher security than the POW mechanism and a very high cost of doing evil. When high security and a more centralized trend are combined, these two seem to be contradictory, which is a point that has been debated for a long time.
